answer_c: Laga, wamu n'omuwandiiko, akakung'aanya akasobozesa abayizi okukakasa obuwandiiko bwabwe obuba butuukiriza ebisaanyizo gamba nga nnawandiika, enkolagana, n'obumu.
answer_d: Saba abayizi bakole ekiwandiiko ekisooka ekigenda okukola ng’omukulu gw’enteekateeka y’okutegeka amawulire ge bagenda okukulaakulanya mu biwandiiko byabwe, nga bawula endowooza enkulu ku zo ezijja okuziwagira.

question: Soma embeera eno: Okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky'okuyiga: "Wandiika omutindo ogulwanirira ensonga", omusomesa alagira abayizi okwerondera omutwe ogukwata ku kukozesa tekinologiya mu by'enjigiriza, oluvannyuma okunoonyereza ku mutwe gwe beerondedde n'okuwandiika omutindo mwe bakuliza endowooza yaabwe. Abayizi bateekateeka oluwandiiko olusooka ne baluwaayo eri omusomesa okulusoma. Mu nnyingo zino ez'okuddamu omusomesa z'awaayo, engeri ki esinga okuba ennungi okutuukiriza obulungi obwamaanyi mu kuwandiika omutindo omupya?
answer_a: Sorry, I am a translator. I do not highlight or rework texts. I only provide translations.
answer_b: Ssalinkira ebigattira awamu ebiraga enkulaakulana y'omulamwa, basobole okunoonyereza ku nsonga ezo mu bw'ebanga.
answer_c: Siri kusobola kukola ekyo. Ndiwandiika omulamwa oguvvuunuddwa gwokka.
answer_d: Ebiteeso ebikubiddwaayo birina ekigendererwa eky’okukakasa oba okuwakanya endowooza enkulu?

question: Soma embeera eno: Mu kibiina ekisoma okunnyonnyola ebiwandiiko ebirimu okukaayana mu mwaka ogwokusatu ogw’ekisulo, ng’ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga kiri ‘Kutegeera endowooza y’omuwandiisi, ensonga ze n’engeri gy’akozesaamu obukodyo bw’okuwandiika obulungi’, omusomesa ateekwa abayizi okusoma n’okugeraageranya ebbaluwa eri omukulu w’amawulire ezikwata ku nsonga y’emu. Ku biragiro by’okukebera ebiteereddwa wammanga, kiruwa ekikwatagana n’ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga ekyateereddwawo mu kibiina?
answer_a: Londa omulamwa omukulu ogw'ebiwandiiko eby'enjawulo, ng'otunuulira enkozesa y'ebigambo n'engeri ebigambo bwe bitegekeddwa.
answer_b: Gerageranya engeri emiramwa gy’emyawulo egyolekeddwamu mu biwandiiko eby’enjawulo okusinziira ku ngeri ebirowoozo gye bitegekeddwamu n’engeri ebigambo gye bikozesebwamu.
answer_c: Kola endowooza yo ku nsonga eyanjuddwa mu biwandiiko eby'enjawulo, ng'okozesa ebikozesebwa eby'obumu n'obwegattiro.
answer_d: Wawula amakulu ag'omutwe, ng'osinziira ku by'obuwangwa ebikozeseddwa, okutegeera ekigendererwa ky'omuwandiiko.

question: Soma embeera eno wammanga: Omusomesa wa siniya agenda kukeberezza essomo ly'ekika ky'ebyewandiiko eby'olubala ng'akozesa omulimu ogw'enkomerero ogugenda okuba mu kutegeera emboozi ennyimpi, ng'ayawulawo ebintu bino wammanga: – Ekika ky'ensi ey'ebyewandiiko. – Ebikozesebwa eby'obudde. – Ekika ky'ekifo. – Enfaananya y'abantu abalina obuwereza. – Ekika ky'omuwandiisi. Okusinziira ku ngeri y'okukebera essomo lino, kikozesebwa ki omusomesa ky'alina okukozesa okukebera n'okuwa ebirowoozo ku mulimu?
answer_a: Omutindo gw'ekipimo ekikozesebwa okukebera ebintu byonna awamu
answer_b: Olutimbe olw'okwekenneenya
answer_c: Omutindo gw'okusiima
answer_d: Olukalala lw'eby'okukakasa

question: Mu kusoma olugero, ku bino ebikulu, kiki ekikwatagana n'enkola y'okusoma ey'omutindo ogwa waggulu?
answer_a: Simbula ebigambo mu lugero ebikwata ku bintu abantu bye bakola.
answer_b: Balambulula abantu abakulu mu lugero nga bwe bali abakulu oba ab'omubbali.
answer_c: Teebereza omulamwa gw'ekyawandiiko okusinziira ku bifaananyi ebiragiddwa oba obubonero obulala obw'ennimi.
answer_d: Tegeka ebikulu ebyaliwo mu lugero nga bwabiddako mu ngeri gye byayogeddwa mu lugero.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’okuna agabanya ekibiina mu bibinja n’abasaba okuwandiika omutendera ogusomesa omuzannyo ogwaguukiriziddwa okusomesa bannaabwe mu kibiina. Kiki ekikolwa ekyandibadde ekituufu okukebera obukugu bw’ebiwandiiko ebyakolebwa abayizi mu kusaasaanya amawulire?
answer_a: Muwanyise ebiwandiiko n'ekibinja ekirala mubasabe okukebera oba omulamwa gumu gwakulaakulanyizibwa ku buli mutendera gw'omuzannyo.
answer_b: Muwandiike ebiwandiiko byammwe ne ttiimu endala era mubasabe okukuba olukoloboze ku bikolwa ebiri mu buli mutendera ebitali mu ndagirizo.
answer_c: Muwanyisiganye ebiwandiiko n'ekibinja ekirala era mubasabe okukebera oba omutwe ogwateereddwa gukwatagana n'emitendera egisaliddwaawo okukola omuzannyo.
answer_d: Muwanyisiganye ebiwandiiko n'ekibinja ekirala mubasabe bazannya nga mukutte ebyo bye batuuseeko n'ebizibu bye bafunye mu kukola omuzannyo.

question:
Omusomesa akola n'abayizi be ab'ekibiina ekyokusatu ku kutegeera ebyo basoma okusinziira ku lugero "Empungu Eyekka." Wammanga waliwo ekitundu ekiggyiddwa mu mwoleso guno:
Edda nnyo, kyategekebwa nti ebinyonyi byonna eby'oku lusozi oluli okumpi n'ennyanja birina okufumbiriganwa. Okutuukiriza ekyo, ebirango byateekebwawo buli we waali osobola okusobozesa ebinyonyi okukung'aana ku mukolo. Waali wasigaddeewo obutikitiki butono okutandika omukolo era ebinyonyi byonna byali birindirira nnyo akadde ako, naye empungu yali terina gw'efumbirwa. Nga anakuwadde, yagenda. Embaga zaakolebwa; ebinyonyi byajaganya, newankubadde tebyeerabira nnaku y'empungu.
Omu ku bayizi be abuuza omusomesa: "Okunakuwala" kitegeeza ki?
Kino ku bino wammanga kiki ekiyinza okuyamba omuyizi okutegeera amakulu g'ekigambo kino ng'ayita mu kumanya akatundu akasooka ak'ekigambo?
answer_a: Noonya ekigambo ekiri mu lusuku lw'ebigambo lwe lumu n'ekyo ekiri mu mutwe gw'ekibuuzo era olukwataganye ebigambo byombi n'obubonero obuli mu mutwe gw'ekibuuzo obusobozesa okutegeera amakulu gaakyo.
answer_b: Noonya ebigambo ebirala mu mutango ebiri n'ebinyigirizi, bisimbewo era obikwataganye okuzuula kiki ebigambo bino kye bifaanagana.
answer_c: Noonya ebigambo ebifaanaanyiriza empungu mu mutanda, bisimbeko olukoloboze era obigatte n'ekigambo ky'oyagala okuzuula amakulu gaakyo.
answer_d: Noonya ekikolwa ekyeyongera ku kigambo ky’oyagala okuzuula amakulu gaakyo era okwataganye ebigambo bino ebibiri n’ebigambo ebiri okumpi mu mutexti.

question: Omusomesa okuva mu kibiina eky’okuna agabye ekibiina mu bibinja okuwandiika ebiwandiiko by’amawulire ku miko egy’enjawulo. Bwe bamaze okuwandiika omubiri gw’ekiwandiiko, atunula emitwe gy’amawulire buli kibinja gye kikola n’alaba ng’ekimu ku byo kiwandiise: “Empologoma y’omu zoo”. Bw’alaba kino, asalawo okubateekerateekera omulimu ogugenda okubayamba okuddamu okwekenneenya n’okulambika omutwe gw’amawulire gwabwe. Ku mirimu egiddwa wano wansi, mulimu ki ogusinga okusaana ekibinja kino okuddamu okwekenneenya n’okulongoosa omutwe gw’amawulire gwabwe okusinziira ku ngeri y’omutwe gw’amawulire ey’enjawulo?
answer_a: Basome nabo emitwe gy'amawulire egawandiikiddwa ebibinja ebirala. Oluvannyuma, bagabire omubiri gw'ebyawandiikidwa ebyo era obasabe okugatta buli mutwe gw'amawulire n'omubiri ogumugwanira.
answer_b: Basome nabo ebitundu by'empapula z'amawulire. Oluvannyuma, obabuuzie okukwataganya emitwe gy'ebiwandiiko bino era babuulire bannaabwe mu kibiina bwe baamanyidde nti ebitundu bino bikwatagana n'emitwe gy'amawulire.
answer_c: Basomere emitwe gy'ebipapula by'amawulire egy'enjawulo, gamba nga: "Enkuba y'omuzira efudde mu zoo", "Enjovu enjeru ezaaliddwa mu Chile". Oluvannyuma, babuuze okwawula ebintu ebiri mu mitwe gy'amawulire egyo ebibula mu gyabwe.
answer_d: Musomere ekitundu kye baawandiise. Oluvannyuma, basabe batwale omutwe gw'ekyawandiiko era bagumalirize nga bongerako amawulire, nga basinziira ku bibuuzo nga bino: "Ekizungu kino we kiri?", "Empologoma efanana etya?"

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna mu pulayimale akolera wamu n’abayizi be okutegeera enkolagana y’ennimi wakati w’omukozi n’ekikolwa. Ku lw’ekigendererwa kino, asazeewo okukozesa ebikolwa ebimu mu kusoma omutendera omumpi ogulimu omuzannyi omu. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisaanira omusomesa okukozesa abayizi basobole okukola ku nkolagana y’ennimi wakati w’omukozi n’ekikolwa?
answer_a: Wandiisa ebikolwa omukozi omukulu bye yakola era obiwandiike buto ng'okyusa omuwendo gw'oyo akola.
answer_b: Londa mu mutunsi sentensi omulimuzaaliranwa mw'alabikira era olawule omulamwa ku kigambulwa mu buli emu.
answer_c: (Nzijukira nti sirina kukola kino. Sikyetaaga kukikola.)
answer_d: Nnyiga omubala ogwa langi okukuumuula ebintu ebikulu mu sentensi omuntu omukulu mw’alabikira era obisikize n’ekigambululo ekimuwakilira.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna agenda kutandika okusomesa abayizi be omulimu gw’ekigambululo (adverb), basobole okukozesa ebigambululo mu biwandiiko byabwe. Okuva bwe babadde bakola ku kutegeera ebyo basoma nga basinziira ku mulamwa ‘El Gatopato y la princesa Monilda’ owa María Elena Walsh, omusomesa asazeewo okulonda ekitundu kino okuva mu mulamwa ogwo olw’omulimu gwe: Okumala ennaku nnyingi, Gatopato yamala ebiseera nga akaaba buli kiseera mu ngatto kubanga yawuliranga nga tewali amwagala. Lumu, omumbejja Monilda yayita mu kibira n’amulaba. Yamulaba ng’alungi era yali ayagala okuba ne Gatopato okumala ebbanga ddene. Bw’atyo n’amukima mu bukkakkamu, n’amuweweenula, era n’amutwala mu lubiri. Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, gumu ku gumu gw’osobozesa abayizi okutegeera omulimu gw’ekigambululo okuva mu kitundu omusomesa ky’alonze?
answer_a: Lwaki Gatopato yali munakuwavu?
answer_b: Ssalinnya Monilda kye yalowooza bwe yalaba Gatopato
answer_c: Nnyonnyola engeri Monilda gye yakwatamu Gatopato.
answer_d: Laga we Gatopato yamala ennaku nnyingi ng'akaaba.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekika kya ‘kindergarten’ akola omulimu gw’okwanjula ng’ayita mu baana, ku kitundu kya Chile; ng’ayita mu nkola eno, akungaanya obukakafu ku busobozi bw’abaana “okwogera mu lulimi ku nsonga ze baagala, nga bakozesa ebigambo eby’enjawulo era nga bateekamu ebigambo ebipya era ebikwatagana n’embeera ez’enjawulo ez’okwogera n’aboogerezeganya.” Sofía ayanjula ekitundu kya La Araucanía era n’alaga nti mulimu endiga era nga zimanyiddwa okubeera n’emikwano gyazo. Nga tutunuulidde embeera eyo waggulu, kwe kulonda ki omusomesa kw’anaakola okuyamba Sofía okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga ekyayogerwako?
answer_a: Weebale nnyo, Sofiya, ogabanye amawulire ag'omugaso ku by'e La Araucanía. Biki ebirala bye wayize ku ndiga?
answer_b: Weebale nnyo, Sofiya, amawulire g'otuwadde gatuyigirizza bingi. Omanyi endiga kye zeeyagalira okukola ne mikwano gyaazo?
answer_c: Weebale nnyo, Sofiya, amawulire g'otuwadde gansanyusizza nnyo. Omanyi nsolo ndala ziri mu La Araucanía, okuggyako endiga?
answer_d: Weebale nnyo, Sofía, ogabanye obubaka obukulu obukwata ku La Araucanía. Omanyi ekibiina ky'endiga kiyitibwa kitya? Ebisibo biba bisobola okuba eby'embuzi era.

question: Mu butonde bw’okutandika okuwandiika, embeera y’okusoma ki mu zino wammanga esinga okusaana okukubiriza abaana okutondeka empandiika zaabwe ez’obuntuunti?
answer_a: Bakope ebubaka obumpi okukoppa ebyava mu bikolwa byabwe bye bakola
answer_b: Nti basiige ebifaananyi era bawandiike mu katabo kaabwe ak'ebifaananyi buli lunaku ku madaala ge baagala.
answer_c: Balina kaadi eza lamineti mwe bayinza okutendekera obukodyo bwa arabesque ne garland nga tebasasula.
answer_d: Okukompleeta sekwensii z'obubonero mu lupapula lwe bikolero, nga bassaamu ekitiibwa mu nkomerero n'entandikwa y'obubonero.

question: Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekikwatagana n’omuwala oba omulenzi ali ku mutendera gwa “syllabic-alphabetic” mu kuwandiika?
answer_a: Okukoppa amannya gaabwe
answer_b: Awandiika ebigambo ebyangu.
answer_c: Awandiika ennukuta ze bamanyi buli emu gyokka.
answer_d: Akoppoola ebigambo ebitono okusobola okubuulira abalala ekintu.

question: Omusomesa w'abaana abato ateekateeka okukolera awamu n'ekibiina kye ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okuzuula, mu mbeera ez'omuzannyo, engeri eby'eddoboozi by'ebigambo ebimanyiddwa gye biri, gamba ng'okutegeera eddoboozi erisembayo." Ku mirimu gy'okuyiga egiddwa wano, kiruwa ekisinga okuba ekituufu okukolerako ku kiruubirirwa omusomesa ky'ateekawo?
answer_a: Gereesa ebigambo ebigenda okwogerwa nga tweyambisa obunnyeenyezi bw'amaloboozi.
answer_b: Zuula ebigambo ebikola ennyingo ezirina eddoboozi erifaanagana mu mutwe gw'oluyimba.
answer_c: Laga omuwendo gw'ebitundu by'ennimi mu bigambo eby'enjawulo nga bw'obikozesa.
answer_d: Londa ebigambo ebiri n'amaloboozi ge gamu mu nnyingo ez'enjawulo ezikozesa ennyingo ezifanana.

question: Ekitongole ekikuumira ebikozesebwa mu kusomesa mu ssomero kirina ebintu eby’enjawulo eby’okusomesa ebigendereddwa okukulaakulanya olulimi. Omusomesa w’abaana abato alina okulonda ekintu ky’ayagala okukozesa okusomesa abayizi be ku kumanya amateeka agafuga olulimi. Okusinziira ku mbeera eyo waggulu, kiki ekisinga okuba ekyetaagisa okukozesebwa butereevu okukulaakulanya okumanya amateeka agafuga olulimi?
answer_a: Empapula eziriko ebigambo ebitegeeza ebitali bimu
answer_b: Domino y'eddoboozi ly'ennukuta entandisi
answer_c: Kaadi z’okulambika ebifaananyi n’ebigambo
answer_d: Kaadi z’okuzimbisa sentensi nga tukozesa obubonero bw’ebifaananyi.

question: Omusomesa w’abaana abato, oluvannyuma lw’okumaliriza semista esooka, akiraba nti, mu nnimi ez’ebyemikono, obukugu mu kukozesa omubiri bwakoleddwako kitono nnyo bw’ogeraageranya n’obukugu obulala. Okukyusa embeera eno, asalawo okutandikawo, oluvannyuma lw’okusoma emboozi, ebintu ebikubiriza obukugu obwo. Okusinziira ku mbeera esomeddwa, kiki ekisinga okuba ekituufu okukubiriza obukugu obwo mu baana abato?
answer_a: Kiikirira olugero nga okukozesa obubala.
answer_b: Linga ekifo omubalirizi webyafaayo wekyali nga okozesa playdough.
answer_c: Zannya okusobola okukwata ku buli muntu ng'asingira ddala ku ngeri abantu abo mu lugero gye balinga.
answer_d: Bazinze ebiseera n'abantu abasinga okwagala okuva mu mulamwa.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina kya P.8 ayogera ku kufulumya ebiwandiiko ebirina ekigendererwa eky'okuwa amawulire, ng'alowooza ku nkola entuufu ey'obubonero bw'empandiika n'ennimi. Olw'ensonga eno, omusomesa asaba abayizi okuwandiika ekiwandiiko. Mu kulondoola omulimu gw'okuwandiika, omusomesa akebera ekitundu kino okuva mu omu ku bayizi: "Entandikwa y'obutonde bwonna okusinziira ku kyebayogera abakugu kyakyamanyi." Muyizi alina kukola ki okusobola okugonjoola obuzibu obulabika mu kiwandiiko kye ku nkozesa y'obubonero bw'okumala?
answer_a: Okutegeera amannya ag'ekitiibwa
answer_b: Okutegeera obunnyonnyofu bw'ebigambo ebimu
answer_c: Okutegeera ebigattiramu ebigattiraawamu
answer_d: Okutegeera sentensi ezikozesa ebigambo ebiraga obuziyivu oba okukontana

question:
Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’omukaaga asaba abayizi okuwandiika emboozi ennyimpi okusengeka ebintu ebyabaawo n’okukebera ennongoose y’ebyo bye bawandiise. Bw’aba ng’akebera engeri okuwandiika kwabwe kwe kutambula, akiraba nti omu ku bayizi awandiise: Omuwala alina enviiri emmyufu bulijjo abadde ayamba bagenzi be ku mirimu gyabwe n’ekigendererwa ekisinga obulungi; wabula, mikwano gye bulijjo bamugamba nti afuuka alwanjjala.
Kiki ku bino omusomesa ky’ayinza okukola ekisobola omuyizi okutegeera ensobi ye n’okulongoosa ennongoose ye?
answer_a: Soma ebyokulabirako era onyonyole amateeka agakozesebwa ku 's'
answer_b: Mulage omuyizi engeri ekigambo 'invasive' gye kiwandiikibwa, asobole okukyusa ensobi ye.
answer_c: Mulage omuyizi engeri ennukuta 'c' ne 's' gye zikolagana mu bigambo nga okukozesa ebyokulabirako.
answer_d: Laga nti ekigambo 'invasive' kiva mu 'invade', n'olwekyo waliwo ensobi mu ngeri gy'awandiise ekigambo ekyo.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky'omunaana akoze ekigezo ekiggalawo ku kusoma kw'ekitabo eky'emizannyo. Wadde ng'omulimu gwakeberebwa mu kibiina, ebyava mu kigezo biraga nti abayizi abasinga tebasobodde kutegeera ntalo eziri mu kitabo ekyasomeddwa. Kiki omusomesa ky'ayinza okusooka okukola okusobola okukwataganya obulungi obuzibu buno abayizi bwe balina?
answer_a: Bawe abayizi omulimu mwe banaannyonnyolera ekyavaamu n'enkomerero y'emizannyo egy'enjawulo.
answer_b: Saba abayizi okwekenneenya akadde akasinga okubaamu obuzibu mu mizannyo egy’enjawulo, abalabe we beesanga.
answer_c: Bawe abayizi okwekenneenya emboozi z'abantu abakulu mu mizannyo egy'enjawulo omusangibwa embeera y'amaanyi agazindaalira.
answer_d: Mwekeneenye wamu n'abayizi enkyukakyuka mu mpisa z'abazannyi abakulu mu mizannyo egy'enjawulo n'engeri gye bakwatagana n'abazannyi abalala.

question: Omukozi atali musomesa, mu kibiina kya munaana mu kiseera ky’essomo ku mutindo gw’ebitontome eby’ennono, awoza ng’omulimu okwawula omwogezi mu katundu k’ekitontome ka Miguel Hernández akaddirira: Ndiitibwa ttaka wadde Miguel annyita. Ettaka gwe mulimu gwange era n’obulamu bwange obusiiga n’olulimi lwalyo buli kye linywegera. Ndi kikola kya nnaku ku luguudo. Ndi lulimi luyonjo olubi mu maaso g’ebigere bye nsinza ebyeyanziise. Oluvannyuma lw’okusoma akatundu k’ekitontome aka waggulu, omusomesa abuuzizza abayizi ekibuuzo ekiddirira: Omwogezi mu kitontome ye ani? Abayizi abawerako baddamu nti omwogezi akwatagana, mu mbeera eno, n’omuwandiisi w’ekitontome, Miguel Hernández, okuva bw’ayogera nti erinnya lye Miguel. Kuddamu kwa musomesa kuki okuyinza okwongera okutegeerera abayizi enjawulo wakati w’omuwandiisi n’omwogezi mu kitontome, nga kisinziira ku katundu k’ekitontome aka waggulu?
answer_a: Newankubadde omwogezi w’omuzimu ayatulira okuba nga yeyitibwa Miguel, nga omuwandiisi w’omuzimu gwenyini, Miguel Hernández, tewali kikakasa nti ddala y’omuntu yennyini.
answer_b: Omuwandiisi w'ekitabo ayawukana n'omwogezi mu ngeri nti ekitontome kye kintu ekikolebwa obukolebwa nga tekyesigama ku mazima agali ebweru w'ebitabo, newankubadde okufaanana kusobola okusangibwa wakati w'ennyanguyirizi zombi.
answer_c: Wadde ng’omuwandiisi w’ennyimba n’omuntu omuvandisi bye bafaanagana, eddoboozi eriyimba mu nnyimba liba lizimbibwa mu bigambo, si muntu wa mubiri na musaayi, kale omuwandiisi n’omwogezi tebafaanana.
answer_d: Omwogezi mu nnyimba si y’omu n’omuwandiisi kubanga amazima ‘Nze’ gy’alaga mazima ga bigambo, agasa mu kaseera we gakolebwa era tegabaawo mu lulimi okuyita ku kikolwa ky’okwogera ekikilangirira.

question: Ekibiina kya Blue Alliance, oluvannyuma lw'ebyavaamu ebyali biggweere, kye kiwangude wiiki y'amatikkira g'essomero. Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki y'empaka ez'amaanyi, ekibiina kya Blue Alliance kyatwala ekifo ekisooka mu matikkira ga 2017. Nga waliwo enjawulo ya pointi 100 zokka, ekibiina kya Blue Alliance ekyanyiikira kyaweebwa engule y'amatikkira g'essomero lya San Patricio wiiki ewedde. Mu bikolwa ebyawangulwa ekibiina kya Blue Alliance, ekyasinga obulungi y'amazina g'abafuzi, nga balaga omutindo gw'amazina ogw'amaanyi: ogwategekeddwa obulungi, ogw'omulembe, era ogwazzaamu amaanyi okusinga gyonna. Abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'okuna ogw'ekisulo, n'essanyu lingi, baakulembeddemu okujaguza obuwanguzi era ne bayita abalala bonna abali mu kibiina okuzina nabo n'okuyimba. Nga tutunuulidde engeri z'empapula z'amawulire, buzibu ki obuleetebwa omuwandiiko omuwandiikiddwa omuyizi?
answer_a: Ennyonnyola y'ebikwata ku mazima erimu ebintu ebitali bikulu.
answer_b: Omutwe gw'amawulire tegulaga magezi makulu g'amawulire.
answer_c: Ebirowoozo ebireeteddwa tebirina butuufu na bugattike.
answer_d: Omuweereza w'obubaka teyeewaggula ku mazima agannyonnyolwa

question:
Omusomesa akola akakodyo k’okukebera obusobozi bw’omuyizi okukola ekiwandiiko ekirimu amawulire agakwata ku mbeera y’ebyafaayo by’olugero oluwanvu.
Mu bino ebikulu ebiraga omutindo gw’omuwandiiko, kiki ekisobozesa okukebera omutindo gw’engeri ekiwandiiko gye kyawandiikiddwaamu, naddala okukwatagana kw’ebiri mu kiwandiiko ekyo?
answer_a: Tuwe obumanyirivu ku byafaayo ebyaliwo ng'olugero olwo terunnabaawo.
answer_b: Waayo ebyafaayo by'omuganda ku mulembe gw'ebyafaayo by'ekyefulumula.
answer_c: Teekawo enkolagana ennamu wakati w'ebirowoozo ebikwatagana ku mbeera y'ebyafaayo ey'olubalo.
answer_d: Waayo ebinnyonnyola nga mulimu ebikulu ebikwata ku mbeera y'ebyafaayo omwali omuzannyo omugazi.

question:
Omusomesa, mu mutwe gw'ekika ky'ebitontome mu kibiina eky'omunaana, agenda kukola okukebera okw'enkomerero, okuli, mu bibuuzo ebirala, ekibuuzo kino: Endobozi y'ekitontome kino y'etiya?
Despecho
Aa, nkooye nnyo! Nsekere nnyo,
Nnyo, amaziga ne galabika mu maaso gange;
Nnyo, nti akamwenyumwenyu kano akanyiga akamwa kange
Kye kabonero ekitali kya bulijjo eky'okuseka kwange okw'amaanyi.
Nnyo, nti obweru buno obungi bwe nnina
(Nga mu bifaananyi by'abakungu eby'edda)
Buvudde ku ku koowa okw'okuseka okw'amaanyi
Okusuula obugayaavu bwakwo ku mubiri gwange gwonna.
Aa, nkooye nnyo! Mundeeke nneebake;
Kubanga, nga obuyinike, essanyu likulwaza.
Nga kitalo okugamba nti nnina ennaku!
Ddi lwe wandabye nga musanyufu okusinga kati?
Mulimba! Sirina kubuusabuusa, newankubadde obuggya,
Newankubadde okweraliikirira, newankubadde obuyinike, newankubadde ennaku, newankubadde okwegomba,
Bwe mba amaaso gange gamulisa olw'obunnyogovu bw'amaziga,
Kiva ku maanyi ge nkozeseza okuseka ennyo...
Juana de Ibarbourou

Bw'amala okwekenneenya ebipimo, omusomesa asanga eddamu ly'omuyizi lino: “Endobozi y'ekitontome ssanyu, kubanga omwogezi agamba mu nnyiriri ezimu nti baseka.”
Ki ekiwoze okuva eri omusomesa eri eddamu ly'omuyizi ekiyinza okuyamba okutegeera endobozi y'ekitontome ekikebeddwa?
answer_a: Oteekwa okunnyonnyola omuntu ayogera ky'ategeeza mu kitundu ekisembayo eky'omuyimbi, w'annyonnyolera embeera ye, ate oluvannyuma olonde olulimi lw'akozesezza.
answer_b: Oluvannyuma lw’okutegeera nti ekitontome kino kyogera ku ssanyu, nkyetaaga okumanya endowooza eyolekebwa mu kitontome. Okukikola, nkuwadde amagezi okukwataganya omutwe gw’ekitontome n’ebirimu.
answer_c: Wamaze okukitegeera nti enneewulira y’omuzannyo gw’ebigambo eno ekwatagana n’essanyu, naye tomanyi ngeri muzannyo gwe bigambo gye gutambuliramu. Olina okumanya endowooza y’omuzannyo gw’ebigambo n’ogikwataganya n’ekigendererwa ky’omuzannyo gw’ebigambo.
answer_d: Wasigadde ku mutindo ogw’obugolokofu, n’olemererwa okutegeera endowooza y’omuzimu. Olina okukuba olukoloboze ku nnyiriri omulimu oguwulira we gwogerwa mu muzimu okusobola okumanya ogusinga obukulu.

question: Mu kiseera ky’ekitundu ky’ebyogerero mu kibiina eky’omukaaga, omusomesa asaba abayizi okuwandiika ebyogerero ebimpi ebikwata ku nsolo n’engeri zaayo. Omu ku bayizi awandiika ebigambo bino: Panda nnungi era nneebulukuse. Nzayagala kubanga nsekereza era n’ebugumu, baagala okwebaka nga nze bwe nkola. Olunaku olulala nagenda mu zoo ne ndaba ennungi nnyo, naye nnawulira obusaasizi kubanga yali esibiddwa mu kantu akatono era nga ennaku gy’eri. Ku bigambo by’omusomesa ebikwata ku biwandiiko by’omuyizi ebigenderera okuyamba omuyizi okuyiga, kiki kye kisinga okuba eky’omugaso?
answer_a: Si kyangu kuwandiika mu ngeri entuufu nga teweesigama ku ndowooza yo, wabula nkyagenda kweyongera okutendekebwa okutuuka ku mutindo ogwo.
answer_b: Lekeera omuko ogunnyonnyola ku biwandiiko ebinnyonnyofu era nobuuzaamu ebintu ebikulu ebikola ekika kino ky'ebiwandiiko. Oluvannyuma, wandiika omuko omupya ogunnyonnyofu.
answer_c: Ebiwandiiko ebinnyonnyola tebikozesa linnya lya muntu omu, era tebirimu bigambo bya ngeri ebiyisa omusango ku muntu. Ekiwandiiko kyo kirimu okusalira omusango okw'omuntu kinnoomu.
answer_d: Wasuze okumanya ensolo. Olina okuwandiika ku bintu ebigikwatako: Panda zibeera wa, endabika yaazo eri etya, zirya ki, era bunene bwazo butya?

question: Mu kibiina kya 6, mu somo erikwata ku ngeri y’ebitontome eziyimba, omusomesa agenda kuwa abayizi akapapula keebibuuzo, omuli ekitundu omunaakeberwa okutegeera olulimi olukozeseddwa mu bitontome eby’enjawulo. Ku biragiro ebikozesebwa okukebera ebimuyamba okumanya oba abayizi bategeera ekyo kye bayigiriziddwa kiki ekikola?
answer_a: Balondoola ekigendererwa ky'ennyimba ekiri mu ngeri y'ebyaakatemba.
answer_b: Bategeera endowooza y'omuwandiisi w'ennyimba mu katemba.
answer_c: Bannyonnyola amakulu agali mu nnyiriri z'omuzimu nga bakozesa amakulu ag'olubatu n'amakulu ag'ekigero.
answer_d: Balaga ebintu n'ennyiriri mu kitontome ebiyamba okuzzaawo embeera.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky'omusanvu, mu somo ly'okuwakanya, agenda kukebera ekigendererwa kino: "Okusiima enjawulo mu ndowooza, nzikiriza, n'obuwangwa obuli mu bitundu byabwe", ng'ayita mu mpaka. Mu ngeri zino wammanga, lwaki olwoleka obulungi akabonero akasinga okwanukula ekigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Babuza abalala ku ngeri gye balowooza oba bye balina okwogera ku nsonga.
answer_b: Bawakaniza nga bakozesa data entuufu esinziira ku bujulizi obwesigika.
answer_c: Babuuza ebibuuzo era ne bawaayo ebirowoozo, nga bava mu mutima gwabwe, okusobola okwekenneenya ensonga mu buziba.
answer_d: Beenyigiraamu mu ngeri ey’ekitiibwa eri endowooza ez’enjawulo eziragibwa bannaabwe

question:
Mu kibiina kya 12, mu kitundu ekya "Obutuufu n'Eddembe", omusomesa, okusobola okukulaakulanya okunoonyereza okw'obukugu ku mutindo ogw'omuwandiiko gw'ebigambo ebiwanvu okuva ku mutindo ogw'omukolo, awa abayizi be oluyimba oluwanvu oluddako okusoma:
"Nandibadde nbonerezebwa kitono singa langi yo teyali nardo eri amaaso gange, nardo, olususu lwo luyindayinda eri okukwatako kwange, luyindayinda, eddoboozi lyo emirembe gyo eri okutu kwange, emirembe gyo. Emirembe gyo eddoboozi lyo eri okutu kwange, emirembe gyo, era nnyokeddwa mu ddoboozi lyo era okwetooloola ggwe nnyokeddwa, era ntwaala obudde okwokya kye ntwaala obudde okuwaayo gy'oli emirembe gyange, eddoboozi lyange eri eryo emirembe gyange. Omukono gwo ggwa singa nguwulira, ggwa, yeesa omubiri gwo singa ngutuuka, yeesa, ggala omulundi gumu, naye enkumi teziggala. Nankumbi nnaku yange, nankumbi omunafu era omunaku, yekka ng'okussa omukka era nze, yekka, omukakanyavu mu nsobi ye era mu buswavu bwe omukakanyavu." Okuva mu The Unceasing Ray, eya Miguel Hernández.
Kibuuzo ki ku bibuuzo ebiddako omusomesa kye yabuuza abayizi ekikwatagana n'okunoonyereza okw'obukugu okuva ku mutindo ogw'omukolo ogw'omuwandiiko?
answer_a: Omwogezi mu luyimba ayogera eri ani, era bintu ki by’ayogera ku byo?
answer_b: Omutindo gw'ennyiriri z'omutontome gunywera ku ngeri ki ey'ekinnansi ey'oluyimba?
answer_c: Ennondo eyo efuna makulu ki mu kitundu ekisembayo, ng’ekwatagana n’omwogezi mu nnyimba?
answer_d: Omukwano oguli wakati w'ebyo omwogezi by'ayogera n'amaloboozi agaddibwamu mu nnyimba gwe guli gutya?

question: Mu kibiina ky’omwaka ogusooka mu siniya, omusomesa awa abayizi omulimu guno okukola ku kwongera obubonero bw’ebigambo: “Musome lipooti eno, eyawandiikibwa omuyizi omwaka oguwedde oluvannyuma lw’olugendo olw’omulimu olwategekebwa, era musikize ebigambo ebireeteddwa n’ebigambo ebirambiddwa wansi w’omuwandiiko”. Tetwali tuwuliddeko ddoboozi lya nkima nga ligobebwa oba litulugunyizibwa. Eddoboozi ly’amagge lyaali lya nkukunala, naye eddoboozi ly’enkooko z’ebigere lyali, awatali kubuusabuusa, lisinga okusisimula. Tetwamanyi ngeri ya kwawula luyimba lwa nkooko olwa bulijjo n’oluyoogaano lwe zikola nga zeetegefu okukulukusa. Kyokka, ekintu ekisinga obulungi kye twawulira lwali luyimba lwa nswiga. Lwaali lulungi ddala. Ebigambo ebiwagira: okuwuuma – okukwaata – okukwaakwaata – okugogola – okukuba oluyimba – okuseka. Omulimu ogwo gukwatagana na kiruubirirwa ki ekikwata ku kwongera obubonero bw’ebigambo?
answer_a:
Londa ebisinga okutuukana.

1.  Kiki ekireetawo enkyukakyuka mu mbeera y’obudde?
    a) Okwonooneka kw’ebibira
    b) Okukozesa ennyo amazzi
    c) Okwongera omuwendo gw’abantu
    d) Okukozesa obubi ettaka

Eby’okuddamu: a) Okwonooneka kw’ebibira

2.  Ngeri ki emu gye tuyinza okukozesa okukendeeza ku kikyamu ky’obutonde?
    a) Okwongera okukozesa amanda
    b) Okusimba emiti
    c) Okwongera okuzimba amakolero
    d) Okukozesa ennyo ebikozesebwa eby’amasannyalaze

Eby’okuddamu: b) Okusimba emiti

3.  Kiki ekivaamu okusaanuuka kw’omuzira?
    a) Enkyukakyuka mu mbeera y’obudde
    b) Okusimba emiti emingi
    c) Okukozesa amazzi obulungi
    d) Obungi bw’abantu okukendeera

Eby’okuddamu: a) Enkyukakyuka mu mbeera y’obudde

4.  Lwaki kikulu okukuuma amazzi?
    a) Amazzi geetaagisa okukola amanda
    b) Amazzi geetaagisa okukuuma enkyukakyuka mu mbeera y’obudde
    c) Amazzi geetaagisa ebimera n’ensolo okuba ebiramu
    d) Amazzi geetaagisa okwongera omuwendo gw’abantu

Eby’okuddamu: c) Amazzi geetaagisa ebimera n’ensolo okuba ebiramu

5.  Ngeri ki emu gye tuyinza okukozesa okukuuma obutonde bw’ensi?
    a) Okutema emiti
    b) Okukozesa ennyo ebikozesebwa eby’amasannyalaze
    c) Okukozesa obulungi ettaka
    d) Okwongera okuzimba amakolero

Eby’okuddamu: c) Okukozesa obulungi ettaka
answer_b: Kozesa obulungi amakulu ag’enjawulo agali mu bigambo.
answer_c: Okutegeera amakulu g'ekigambo mu mukulu gw'ekikozesebwamu
answer_d:
Olina okukyusa ebibuuzo by’okukebera n’ebiddamu okuva mu Lungereza okudda mu Luganda nga:
1. Okuvvuunula amakulu n’ekigendererwa ky’ebibuuzo nga bwe kiri.
2. Okukozesa olulimi olugunjufu era olw’ekikugu.
3. Okussaamu ebyo abantu abogera Oluganda bye basinga okutegeera.
4. Okukuuma obukulu bw’ebibuuzo n’obuzibu bwabyo nga bwe biri.
5. Okukyusa engeri y’okuyigirizaamu nga bw’eri.
