question: Omusomesa ayagala okukolera ku kuwandiika kw'omuzannyo ogw'ekigambo mu Siniya ey'Omwaka ogw'olubereberye mu Ssomero Esekendule. Ku lw'ekigendererwa kino, asaba abayizi okusoma ekiwandiiko ky'amawulire ate oluvannyuma bawandiike omuzannyo omufupi mu bitundu bisatu nga basinziira ku mutwe gw'ekiwandiiko. Nga tutunuulidde ebiseera by'enkola y'okuwandiika, ku bikolwa by'abayigiriza ebigoberera wano kiki ekisinga okuluŋŋamya okuzimba okukkaanya kw'omuzannyo?
answer_a: Lambulula omulamwa gw'enteekateeka ogwoleseddwa ku kuzimba enkaayana mu katemba.
answer_b: Mu kubuulirira, mu kukungaanya kw'okwetereeza mu muzannyo, lwongosa okutegeera obuzibu obuli mu muzannyo.
answer_c: Lambulula engeri enkaayana gye yazimbibwamu mu kwetegereza, ng’olaga okwekebera ng’okozesa akabonero k’omutindo.
answer_d: Lungereza engeri entalo bwe zizimbibwa mu kuddamu okutereeza, ng’olaga omutindo ogusuubirwa ku ngeri entalo gye zizimbibwamu.

question: Omusomesa wa siniya agenderera okukolera awamu n'abayizi ku kumanya amannya agasikira amannya agaalaga ebintu eby'enjawulo. Okutuukiriza kino, omusomesa awaayo akatebe akalaga amannya agasikira amannya ag'obuntu, agalaga, n'ag'obwannannyini, era n'ateesa okusoma olugero olumpi olulaga luno: Okutya Obutuufu Okuva ku Mmande okutuuka ku Lwokutaano, yatambulanga mu ggaali y'omukka ey'omunda. Yatambulanga ennyiriri zonna n'amatabi okumala essaawa nnyingi. Yamanyanga buli mukuumi wa siteeseni. Anaatera kumala bbanga ki ng'alya eby'obulimba, bwe baamugambanga. Lwaki tamubuulira nti yagobebwa emyezi egiyise. (Paola Rivera). Oluvannyuma lw'okusoma, omusomesa abuuza abayizi ku mannya agasikira amannya agaalaga ebintu mu lugero. Omuyizi agamba nti ekigambo "las" kikwatagana n'ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu lugero. Buzibu ki ekyo omuyizi ky'alaga mu ky'addamu mu bukwatagana n'ekyo omusomesa kye yasabye?
answer_a: Enjawulo wakati w'endabika y'ennyingo n'ebika ebirala eby'ennimi
answer_b: Okutegeera ebintu ebyogerwako nga tukozesa ekigambo "las" okukwataganya n'ekigambo "siteseni"
answer_c: Obutamanya butonde bw'omu makkati obw'omubala ogw'ekibuuzo: abakuumi, ye, omukyala
answer_d: Okutegeera amannya agasinga n'engeri zaago ez'enjawulo.

question:
Omusomesa omukulu mu ssomero erisukkulumu akolera wamu n’abayizi ku kusoma, okwekenneenya, n’okunnyonnyola ebiwandiiko ebirimu ennyimba ebikwata ku mutwe gw’obutebenkevu. Mu mulimu, bawuliriza oluyimba “El cautivo de Til Til” era oluvannyuma ne basabwa okwekenneenya n’okulambulula omwogezi w’ennyimba okusinziira ku kitundu kino ekiggwaamu:
Bagamba erinnya lye ye Manuel
era bamutwala ku luguudo oludda e Til Til,
nti gavana tayagala
kulaba mpisa ze ennungi ku La Cañada.
Bagamba nti mu lutalo yali
asinga era mu kibuga
yamulisa ng’okumyansa
kw’obutebenkevu.
(...)
Bagamba yali ng’okumyansa
bwe yali yeebagala embalaasi ye
era nti omwebagazi bwe yayitawo
buli omu yamuyita erinnya Manuel.
Simanyi oba nja kudda
okumulaba ng’ali omutebenkevu era omulungi,
kye mmanyi kyokka yaseka mu kkubo
okudda e Til Til.
El cautivo de Til Til, engeri Aquelarre gye yakikolaamu.
Bw’amala okwekenneenya omulimu, omusomesa asanga eky’omuyizi ono kye yawandiise:
“Omwogezi alinga eyejjukanya era ng’alowooza yekka. Ali mu nnaku n’obwennyamivu, naye muzira, ng’okumyansa kw’obutebenkevu. Okugeraageranya kuno omwogezi kw’akoze kundabika okuba okw’omugaso ennyo kubanga okumyansa kintu ekimyansa era n’obutebenkevu bwe butyo. Ayogera ku linnya lya kifo mu Chile, era mu butuufu, takozesa bigambo bizibu.”
Kizibu ki ekyo omuyizi kye yawandiise ekirina akakwate ku kigendererwa ky’omulimu omusomesa gwe yawa?
answer_a: Kiraga obutategeeragana obutono wakati w'omutwe ogwogerwako n'eddoboozi erikozeseddwa mu muwandiiko.
answer_b: Kikola eky'okuddamu ekyewala ekyo ekibadde kibuuziddwa mu kintu ekyo, nga kissa essira ku bintu ebirala ebiri mu kitontome.
answer_c: Kissa ku kusiima kw'omuntu ku bubwe okusinga ku biri mu nnyiriri z'oluyimba okusobola okumanya omwogezi.
answer_d: Kiraga nti tewaliwo bukakafu bujjuvu okuva mu kyawandiikidwa mu kuddamu, kubanga kyogera ku kigeraageranyo ekyakolebwa mu kyo, naye si ku nnyiriri endala.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okubiri mu siniya atendeka abayizi okuwandiika ebiwandiiko ebinnyonnyola. Mu kiseera ky’omulimu guno, akyusaamu ebiteeso bino okuva mu biwandiiko ebyawandiikiddwa abayizi be: "Bakoze kyonna ekisoboka okukendeeza okuyiiya ggaasi, n’olwekyo, tebannakituukako" era "Tewali nkyukakyuka zirabika zikoleddwa mu nkola y’okukola ku bikulukusi eby’obutonde, era n’obuyambi bw’ensimbi butuuse okubissa mu nkola." Kiki ekizibu ekikulu ekirabika mu biwandiiko ebyaleeteddwa abayizi?
answer_a: Obutabaawo busobozi bwonna bwa kuteekawo bigattabigambo okusobola okukulaakulanya empandiika.
answer_b: Obutabaawo butondeezi mu ngeri эннаawulo ez’enjawulo ezikwaata ku makulu.
answer_c: Obutamanya bukugu mu nkolagana z'amakulu agazimba ebiwandiiko
answer_d: Enkozesa embi ey'ebigattira okutandikawo enkolagana ey'obuzito wakati w'ebirowoozo

question:
Mu katabo, omuntu asobola okulaba obutali bwadde eri abantu abasinga, naddala omuntu omukulu, okukola kyebaagala oba okweyisa nga bwe baagala. Ng’ekyokulabirako, mu kifo ekimu omuntu ayogera ku byafaayo agamba nti tewali n’omu asobola kuwasa gw’ayagala kubanga bwe bakwatibwa basobola okusibwa oba okuttibwa. Kino kindabika bubi nnyo kubanga omuntu tasobola kuba muddeeri okubeera n’omuntu gw’ayagala era, oluusi, mu nnaku zino, kino kisobola okulabika, ng’ekyokulabirako, abantu bwe bakakibwa oba okwekaka okubeera n’omuntu olw’obwangu oba olw’okweraga oba ssente so si lwa kwagala.
Ku bino ebiteekateeka ebisobola okuva eri omusomesa ku ky’omuwandiisi, kiki ku bino ekiyinza okuba eky’amugaso ku nkozesa y’ebikwata ku biwandiiko?
answer_a: Bw’otooteekemu biwandiiko eby’okukakasa, endowooza zo zijja kuggwaamu obutuufu.
answer_b: Yongera ku kamunnyeenye ako n’ensonga endala ey’ekizibu era ogiwagire n’ekigambo ekiggiddwa mu katabo.
answer_c: Singa mu kifo ky’okwogera ku katabo, onoonnyonnyola ekitundu ky’ekiwandiiko ky’oyagala okwogerako, kyandibadde kyeyolefu.
answer_d: Ddamu osome omulongoosa ogunnyonnyola ebyo ebinukuta ebyoleka bye bikola era otunule nnyo ku byokulabirako ebiragiddwa.

question: Omusomesa, akolera ku nsonga z’okuwakanya n’ekibiina ky’abalenzi n’abawala abali mu mwaka ogw’okusatu mu ssomero lya siniya, akyusa ekiwandiiko kino okuva ku omu ku bayizi be: “Abamu ku bawabuuzi abakugu bagambye nti, mu kiseera kino, tusangiddwa nga tulina omuwendo gw’ebifulumizibwa ogwa ggaasi ogusinga obungi mu myaka esatu egiyise.” Mu bigambo bino ebiri wammanga, kiki ekiyinza okuba eky’okuddamu ekisobola okutereeza ensobi y’okukwatagana eragiddwa ekigambo “ogusinga obungi” mu kiwandiiko ekiri waggulu?
answer_a: Ekitundu kiraga obutakkaanya mu ngeri ebigambo "ebisinga waggulu" bwe bikozesebwamu mu grama.
answer_b:
**Original Text:**

Which of the following numbers is the highest?

a) 10
b) 25
c) 5
d) 100

**Translated Text:**

Mu namba zino wammanga, eruwa esinga obunene?

a) 10
b) 25
c) 5
d) 100
answer_c: Ekigambo "ekisinga waggulu" kikwatagana na kintu ki mu bungi bw'ennamba y'ebigambo?
answer_d: Nnina kusoma omutwe gwange omulundi ogw'okubiri, nzunule ensobi z'empandiika era ngiwandiike buto mu ngeri entuufu.

question: Omusomesa wa kkindagateni yeetaaga okukola okukebera okuzuula obukugu bw'abaana mu bigambo, naddala obusobozi bwabwe okumanya amakulu g'ebigambo n'okutegeera ekibinja kye birimu. Mbeera ki ey'omusomo esaanira okukungaanya obukakafu obukwata ku bukugu buno?
answer_a: Baaleete abaana okuzannya emizannyo gy'okubuzaabuza. Ebirungo ebikulu eby'ebigambo eby'enjawulo bigenda kwogerwa, nga tetukozesezza bikozesebwa okulaba. Kozesa olukalala okukweka ebyo ebituukiddwaako.
answer_b: Leeta abaana ebintu eby’enjawulo n’ebisero ebikiikirira ebibinja eby’enjawulo, obasabe okulonda ekimu ku bintu ebyo, okwogera erinnya lyakyo, n’okukissa mu kibinja. Pima engeri gye bakozesezzaamu olubimbi.
answer_c: Baaleete abaana okwetegereza akataabaliro akalimu ebibinja eby’enjawulo, era obawa kaadi ze balina okukwataganya n’ekibinja ekikwatagana nazo. Kozesa empapula z’ebyo abanaakoze okukweka engeri gye bakolamu.
answer_d: Bawe abaana empapula erimu ebifaananyi by’ebika by’ebintu eby’enjawulo, obasabe okulonda ekimu bakinyonnyole nga tekyogedde linnya lyakyo. Bannaabwe balina okwogera ekigambo ekyo n’okwogera ekika kyakyo. Kebera engeri gye bakozesezzaamu ebipimo.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekinaana asomera abayizi be ekitundu kino okuva mu lubalo *Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kw’Empeewo,* olwa Alicia Morel:  Simooni akamyu yalina omululu omungi. Era yalina omukyala, Clarita, n’amaka amanene ag’abaana munaana, kubanga baali “bazaala nnyo.” Ku lunaku olw’omusana ogw’obutiti, lumu ku zo lw’owulira ng’oyagala okudduka n’okubuuka okuyita mu nnimiro n’ensozi, Simooni yayita mukyala we okutwala amaka mu bbanga eddalu. “Clarita, kozesa bulungi obudde obulungi kubanga enkya enkuba egenda kutonnya!” “Olowooza nti ndi mulalu? Embwa oba ekibe ekibeera mu kibira ekiriraanye wano bayinza okujja,” bwe yaddamu, nga yeekukumye mu kinnya. “Mbwa ki oba ebibe ki! Leero lwe lunaku lw’emirembe.” “Oli mukakafu?” “Siri mugumu kumala kubeera wano waggulu singa leero si lwe lunaku omuyizzi yenna atasobola kuyigga,” Simooni yakakasa, ng’agalamidde okufuna omusana.  Kibuuzo ki ku bino omusomesa ky’ayinza okubuuza abayizi okusobola okukola okuteebereza okuva mu mutwe gw’ekigambo?
answer_a: Embeera y'obudde yali etya ku lunaku Simon lwe yakubira mukyala we essimu?
answer_b: Ekirowoozo kyo ku nneeyisa ya Simon eri Clarita kyali ki?
answer_c: Lwaki Simon yali ayagala mukyala we atwale abaana ebweru olunaku olwo?
answer_d: Clarita alaga kirowoozo ki ky’alaga bw’addamu bba we?

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibina eky’okubiri yakolera ku mulimu gw’engero ya Cinderella n’abayizi be era oluvannyuma yakola akakeeno akampi okukebera obutegeevu bw’abayizi. Emu ku bibuuzo omusomesa bye yabuuza yali: “Lwaki baganda ba Cinderella abakulu baakakasa okwambala engatto ey’ekyupa wadde nga teyabamala bulungi?” Kiraga ki omusomesa ky’agezaako okukebera ng’abuuza ekibuuzo ekyo?
answer_a: Bategeera obuzibu obuli mu biwandiiko ebitegeka emboozi.
answer_b: Zinyweza enkolagana y'ensonga n'ekigendererwa mu biwandiiko ebinnyonnyola.
answer_c: Balambulula omulandira gw’ebintu ebyabaawo mu nteekateeka y’ebifaayo.
answer_d: Balaga engeri z'abantu abakulu abakolerera abantu abakulu abakulu mu biwandiiko ebitegeerekeka.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna ateekateeka ekibuuzo okukebera obusobozi bw’abayizi be okutegeera ebiwandiiko nga ayita mu bibuuzo ebikwata ku biwandiiko ebitali bya bulombolombo. Mu biwandiiko ebirondeddwa, omusomesa mw’ateekeddeko kino: Ebinyira bye byokka ku nsolo ez’amabeere ebirina ebiwawaatiro ebisobola okubuuka. Emu ku mpisa zaabyo ze zirina kwe kuba nti zirina amaaso agatali malirivu, kale nga zeeyambisa enkola ey’amazaalisa ag’omwanguka omungi agatawulikika eri abantu okweyawula n’okuzuula ebintu ebiziyiza n’emmere. Nsolo za kiro eziriisa ebiwuka n’ensolo entono. Okufaanana ng’enjuki n’ebiwuka ebirala, ebinyira bikola omulimu omukulu mu butonde: byebisaaza nga singa tebibaddewo ebimera bingi tebyandisobodde kuzaala. Newankubadde ebinyira bitera kulowoozebwa ng’ensolo entono, waliwo ebinyira eby’ebika ebyenjawulo. Ekitono kiyinza okuzitowa nga giraamu 1.5, ate ekinene kiyinza okuzitowa nga kirogulaamu 1.2 era nga kiyina obuwanvu bw’ebiwaawaatiro mita 1.5. Ebinyira bisangika ku kontineenti zonna, okujjako Antatika. Okufaanana ng’emmese ezibeera mu ttaka, nsolo za mabeere ez’obusuubuzi bw’omubiri bwe businziira ku mbeera y’obudde, naddala nga tezikola. (Ekyaggyiddwa mu: www.nationalgeographic.com.es/animales/murcielagos). Ku bibuuzo bino wammanga, kiki ekisobozesa okukebera okuggyawo amawulire agazzeemu mu kiwandiiko ekiri waggulu?
answer_a: Lwaki ebinyira tebisangika mu Antarctica?
answer_b: Lwaki obunene bw’ebinyira butera kukwataganyizibwa na kuba bisolo bitono?
answer_c: Kiki ekirawula ebinyira ku nsolo endala ez'omu nnyanja?
answer_d: Lwaki abantu tebasobola kuwulira maloboozi ga mpulubbi ge zikola?

question: Mu nkola zino wammanga, y’ennu y’erina okukozesebwa abayizi abali mu kibiina eky’okuna okwetegeera amakulu agattibwa ku bigambo ebyongerwako obutundutundu obukyusa amakulu gaabyo?
answer_a: Soma omutwe guno: "Omulangira omuto yali mukozi wa nsaano era nga mujeemu. Yalina okuweebwa buli kyayagalanga kubanga kabaka, kitaawe, yagamba nti tewali kintu na kimu kirina okugaana omwana wa kabaka". Oluvannyuma oddemu: Lwaki kyogeddwa nti omulangira omuto yali mukozi wa nsaano era nga mujeemu?
answer_b: Basa ekigambo: "Bannasayansi bakyanoonyereza ku kiki ekigenda mu maaso n'ebiziba by'omuzira ebinene ennyo ebya Antarctica okulaba engeri gye bisobola okukosaamu enkulungo y'ensi n'okuleeta embeera y'obudde etali nkalakkalira nga yeyongera". Oluvannyuma ddamu: Ekigambo ekisimbiddwa olukoloboze wansi mu mutwe gw'ekigambo kitegeeza ki?
answer_c: Soma omutemwa: "Aurora eya Chile nkulu nnyo kubanga yayambako okutumbula endowooza z'obwetwaze. Abanya Chile bangi, nga basoma olupapula lw'amawulire luno, baakakibwa nti Chile eyetongodde ku Spain yali nsobola". Oluvannyuma oddemu: Kiki Abanya Chile kye baakakibwa bwe baali basoma olupapula lw'amawulire olwa Aurora eya Chile?
answer_d: Soma omutundu guno: "Ku Ssande, ekifo ky'ebisolo ekya London kyagguddwawo, oluvannyuma lw'olunaku lumu olw'omuliro ogwawaliriza emirimu okuyimirizibwa. Ekifo ky'ebisolo ekya London, ekisinga obukulu mu nsi yonna, kyaggulawo emiryango gyakyo omulundi ogwasooka mu 1826 era kirimu ebisolo ebiwerako okusinga

question: Omusomesa ow'ekibiina ekyokusatu asoma ekitabo omuyizi omu ky'awandiise: "Nnasanyuka nnyo ku wiikendi enjjuvu. Nagenda mu muzeewo omupya ogw'ebyamagezi oluvannyuma neetalaaga ne ndaba eddubu ddala. Oluvannyuma nnalaba firimu ekwata ku nkulungo, ne ngenda mu dduuka ne ngula ekitabo, ne ndaayo ewaffe ne nkisoma kyonna." Mu bino ebikulu eby'ebiramu n'ennyingo, kiki ekisaanye okutereezezebwa mu kiwandiiko ky'omuyizi?
answer_a: Okukozesa ebigattabigambo
answer_b: Okukozesa ebigambo ebiraga obukakafu n’obutakakafu (Definite and Indefinite articles)
answer_c: Ennyingo z'ebikolwa
answer_d: Okukwatagana kw'ebigambo mu nnyingo

question: Ku mirimu egiddwa wammanga, kkiruwa ki kyennyini ekisobozesa okukolera ku nkwatagana y'ebigambo mu kuwandiika n'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'abiri?
answer_a: Zimba ekifananyi ekyoleka ky'ekigambo ekigambiddwa. Ng'ekyokulabirako, singa ekigambo kigamba: "Oluroza lulina amaggwa", zimbira oluroza olulina amaggwa.
answer_b: Gambawola ng'onyumya ku ngeri abantu abali mu kifaananyi gye balabika. Ng'ekyokulabirako, okuva mu kifaananyi ky'omuzannyi, londa ebbala ly'engoye ze, engeri gy'asiigiddwa ku maaso, n'ebirala.
answer_c: Zannya omupiira gw’okuzuula ensobi mu lulimi lw’omunyamulala. Ng’ekyokulabirako, okuva mu sentensi “Embwa yanywedde amata”, zuula ensobi z’omunyamulala.
answer_d: Okuzannya omuzannyo gw’okukola sentensi ezitaliimu makulu okuva mu bigambo ebiweereddwa. Ng’ekyokulabirako, omuyizi afuna kaadi eriko ekigambo “omugaati” n’akola sentensi etaliimu makulu, gamba nga: “Nnambadde omugaati ogwa bbulu.”

question: Omusomesa w’abaana abali mu myaka egya wakati akiraze nti ekibiina kye eky’abalenzi n’abawala banyumirwa nnyo ebintu ebibaleka nga beeyambisa emikono gyabwe okuyiiya n’okunoonya, era emirundi mingi bakoppa ennukuta okuva mu ngero, magazini, n’obubonero. N’olwekyo, ku ntandikwa ya semista ey’okubiri, ategese okukola ku bigendererwa by’okuyiga bino wammanga: - Omusingi gw’Olulimi Olwogereke: “Okufulumya obubonero bwabwe obw’okuwandiika mu mbeera ez’omuzannyo.” - Omusingi gw’Omubiri n’Entambula: “Okulongoosa enkolagana wakati w’amaaso n’emikono nga bayita mu kukozesa ebintu, ebizannyisibwa, n’ebikozesebwa eby’enjawulo.” Kiki ekireetawo okuyiga okutumbula ebigendererwa ebyateekebwawo omusomesa?
answer_a: Mu kibinja ekinene, mukole omulimu gw'okusoma ebitontome; oluvannyuma, abaana bakoppe ebigambo ebimu nga bwe beetondeera obubaka bwabwe.
answer_b: Mu bubinja obutono, abaana basabiddwa okusalako ebigambo okuva mu magazini n'empapula z'amawulire, ate oluvannyuma okukoppa ebimu ku byo nga bakola ebiwandiiko ebipya.
answer_c: Mu bubinja obutono, abaana bakubirizibwa okuwandiika awamu ekifo ky’emmere, oluvannyuma bafumbe nga bakozesa ebijiko, enfuuwe, n’ebbakuli okukola omugatte.
answer_d: Mu kibinja ekinene, somesa olugero mu ddoboozi ery'omwanguka ate oluvannyuma oyite abaana okusiiga ebifaananyi by'ekibaawo eky'omugongo oba ebifo eby'enjawulo okuva mu lugero nga banoonyereza amannya g'abazannyi.

question: Mu mutendera gw’ekika ky’abaana abato, abakugu mu by’enjigiriza basalawo okuteekateeka engeri y’okukubirizaamu ekigendererwa kino ekikulu mu Lulimi olw’Olukalu: “Okwogera mu kamwa ebyo bye beetaaga n’ebyo bye baagala, nga bayita mu kugatta ebigambo n’ebikolwa, okukozesa ebigambo-ebinyonyola n’oluvannyuma okukozesa sentensi ennyangu.” Bintu ki ebisaanira abaana okukola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a: Mu mwetooloolo ogusooka, saba abaana okuddamu ebigambo okuva mu luyimba. Oluvannyuma, mu mulimu omupya, babagambe okugoberera ennyimba nga bakozesa eby’omubiri n’okuddamu mu bigambo. Bamaliriza nga bayimba nga bakozesa ebivuga ebikubibwa.
answer_b: Mu bibinja ebitono, saba abaana okumunoonya n’okuddamu ebigambo ebiraga amaloboozi g’ensolo ez’enjawulo. Oluvannyuma, mu mulundi omupya, bakubirize okuddamu ebyafaayo ebikwata ku nsolo. Bammaliliza nga bajjuzza sentensi ennyangu n’ebigambo ebivumagira ebikwata ku nsolo.
answer_c: Mu bibinja ebinene, saba abaana okunoonyereza n’okulega ku mukuto gw’ebibala era obakubirize okuzuula ebintu ebikolebwa mu mukuto ogwo okuyita mu bigambo eby’ekikokko. Oluvannyuma, mu mbeera empya, baagambe okulonda nga boogera amannya g’ebibala bye baagala okukozesa okuteekateeka omukuto omupya okulegaako.
answer_d: Mu kusoma olugero, saba abaana okwogera ani omuntu gwe baagala ennyo mu lugero olwo. Oluvannyuma, mu mulimu omupya, babawe ebikozesebwa okukola akakonge ak'omuntu gwe baagala ennyo, era obasabe bakyanjule eri bannaabwe mu kibiina. Mala ng'obakubiriza okuzannya n'akakonge ako era bakole emboozi nga bwe baagala.

question: Omusomesa w’abaana abato ateekateeka okukebera ekigendererwa kino okuva mu mutendera gw’Olulimi: "Okweyoleka mu ngeri entuufu era etegeerekeka, ng’okozesa ennyingo z’ebigambo enzirivu, n’ennyingo z’ebikolwa ezituukira ddala okusinziira ku biro, abantu, n’ebiruubirirwa by’okwogera." Okutuuka ku kino, akola omukolo ogusomesa abaana okukola olugero nga basinziira ku bifaananyi bisatu ebiddiring’ana, omusomesa lw’anaakwata. Isabel, ow’emyaka 5, ayogera olugero luno: "Edda n’edda, waaliwo omulenzi eyalina llana (kikere) ne pello (mbwa) era omulenzi yali yeebase ku kitanda era llana (ekikere) yavudde mu nsuwa ne kigenda, era yakikwata. Enkomerero." Nga tutunuulidde ebisuubirwa mu kwogera kw’omwana ow’omutendera guno, kiki ku lugero lwa Isabel ekiraga nti tannatuuka ku kigendererwa ekyo?
answer_a: Takozesa bigambo bya ngeri mu sentensi.
answer_b: Takozesa bigambo bya ngeri mu sentensi.
answer_c: Takyusa bigambo mu kiseera ekyayita ekyatuukiridde.
answer_d: Tamwogera nnungi nnukuta 'r' ng'ekubisaamu olulimi.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’okusatu agenda kukola omulimu gw’okuwandiika olugero n’abayizi be, ng’asinga kwetikka ku ngeri y’okukyusaamu okutambulira awamu n’embeera y’okwogera. Nga twejjukanya ku ky’omusingi kino eky’omulimu guno, mu bibuuzo bino omusomesa by’abuuza, kibuuzo ki ekisaanidde okusinga abayizi okutandika okuteekateeka engeri gye bagenda okuwandiikaamu ebyo bye baagala okuwandiika?
answer_a: Olugero lwaffe luliba lwa kitya?
answer_b: Tugenda kuwandiikira ani olugero lwaffe?
answer_c: Olugero lwaffe lugenda kusiimattuka wa?
answer_d: Lulimi ki lwe tugenda okukozesa mu lugero lwaffe?

question: Okusinziira ku kyakolebwa mu kugezesa, omuyizi ow’ekibiina eky’okusatu yawandiika ebiwandiiko bino wammanga, ng’annyonnyola ekibaawo ku nsigo nga wayise ennaku mukaaga nga ziteereddwa mu ttaka eriramu. Mayi 12. N’ebimyu ebiramu, nga wayise ennaku 6, ebikoola byalabiseera era kati bisobola okukola ekikolwa ky’okufuna emmere okuva mu musana (photosynthesis). Kiki mu by’empandiika ekyetaaga okutereeza mu by’omuyizi by’awandiise?
answer_a: Okukozesa ebigattabigambo okusinziira ku mirimu gyabyo
answer_b: Okukwatagana kw'omuwendo wakati w'ekigambo ekisonjoladdala n'erinnya.
answer_c: Enkozesa y'enkyukakyuka z'ebigambo ebiraga ebiseera
answer_d: Okukkiriziganya kw'omuwendo wakati w'ekigambululo n'erinnya lyekisikira

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okuna atunula mu biwandiiko by’abayizi be, ebyakolebwa nga basinziira ku mulimu gwe yabawa okwandika olubala lw’ebyaliwo mu maka gaabwe. Omuyizi omu yawaayo ekiwandiiko kino: Olubala lw’ebyaliwo mu maka  Lwamukaaga gwali lunaku lulungi. Nagenda ne maama wange ne bajjajja bange okulya emmere y’Abachina. Nali ngiwagala nnyo! Bwe twatuuka mu resitulanti, twatula ku mmeeza ey’abantu bana ne tusaba menu okulaba ebintu bye tulondawo. Mwalimu ebintu bibiri bye tulondawo, menu A ne B. Twalonda B, kubanga yalimu ebika by’emmere eby’enjawulo bingi. Bwe twamala okusalawo, maama wange yaŋŋamba nti, “Martina, teeka oda.” Noolwekyo nnaita omuweereza ne nteeka oda ya menu B n’ekinywebwa eri buli omu ku ffe. Nnawulira nga nze mukulu!  Kiki omusomesa ky’asaanidde okukyusa mu bigambo ebyo omuyizi by’akozezza mu kiwandiiko kye?
answer_a: Okubumba obungi bw'erinnya "menu."
answer_b: Okukyusa ekikolwa "hacer" (okukola) okusinziira ku muntu n'engeri ekikolwa gye kirimu
answer_c: Omugattiko ogutalina mulamwa ogwa "haber" mu sentensi: “Waaliwo engeri bbiri ez’okulondamu, menu A ne B.”
answer_d: Okukozesa omuntu omu owa nnamba esooka mu sentensi: “Nagenda ne maama wange era ne jjajjaange okulya emmere y’Abachina.”

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’omukaaga ali mu kugezesa okutegeera ebyo abayizi bye basoma. Ng’ekimu ku bikolebwa, abasomesezza ekigeranyo kino nga alina ekigendererwa eky’okukitegeera: Kabalagala ow’omu bbanga, nga oli mulungi, kabalagala ow’omu bbanga nga wa zaabu era nga wa kiragala. Ekitangaala ky’ettaala, kabalagala ow’omu bbanga beerawo, beerawo, beerawo! Beerawo! Kabalagala, oliyo? (Kabalagala, Federico García Lorca). Nkola ki ey’okutegeera by’osoma eyandibadde etuukirawo okukozesebwa oluvannyuma lw’okusoma okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ekyateesebwa?
answer_a: Ekyavaamu eky'ennyimba mu ngeri y'ebitontome kye ki?
answer_b: Ddala olowooza ekiwojjolo kigenda wa?
answer_c: Mugabane n'abayizi bannammwe bye bamanyi ku biwojjolo.
answer_d: Londa ebigambo ebikwata ku kiwojjolo era obigatte ku ngeri ebiri mu muzannyo.

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’omunaana agenda kukolera wamu n’abayizi ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okukola okunoonyereza nga batondekawo ebirondoozebwa nga bakkenenya obulungi ensibuko z’amawulire ze beebuuzaako." Okukola kino, omulimu gwe balina okukola gwe gino: okulonda omuwandiisi gwe baagala okunoonyereza ku mirimu gye oluvannyuma ne boolekera bannaabwe bye bazuula. Ku mirimu egiddwa wano, gwaki ogukubiriza abayizi okunoonya amawulire agasaanidde okukola omulimu ogwo ogwategekeddwa?
answer_a: Basabye okwekenneenya obubaka bwe balina obukwatagana n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe okuzuula ebigambo ebiwagira ebyo bye bamalirizza.
answer_b: Lambulula engeri y’okunoonya amawulire okusinziira ku nteekateeka y’ebibuuzo ebikwata ku bitabo byabwe ebyonna, ng’ekyokulabirako: Omuyiiya alaga atya engeri ye ey’enjawulo mu mulimu guno?
answer_c: Noonya ebitabo ebyawandiikibwa abawandiisi abalondeddwa oba, bwe baba nga tebalondedde, wabula obawandiikire ekitabo okusinziira ku kika ky'ebitabo kye baagala okusobola okufuna endowooza engazi ku mutwe gw'ekyo.
answer_d: Mu biwandiiko ebirambiddwa, lowooza ku kukozesa olukalala lw’ebyo ebiriwo okusinziira ku biragiro nga bino: “Kiwandiikiddwa mu ngeri enteeseteese?” “Kiraga omuwandiisi waakyo oba ekitongole ekivunaanyizibwa?” “Kirimu ebigambo ebyekikugu ebikwata ku nsonga?”

question: Mu ssomero lya P7, mu kiseera kye bayiga ku Nfumo n'Engeri Ensi bwe yatondebwa, omusomesa akola ku kigendererwa kino: "Okwekenneenya omulimu gw'abantu abakulu mu nfumo z'okutonda." Okutuukiriza kino, alonzeemu emboozi ezakolebwa obuwangwa obwenjawulo. Ku bikolwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisaanira abayizi okukola okusobola okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino?
answer_a:
**Eky'omu Kadde: Ensolo enkulu**

*   **Zeusi:** Katonda omukulu mu baddayimooni Abagiriki.
*   **Hera:** Mukyala wa Zeusi era kabona omukulu mu baddayimooni Abagiriki.
*   **Poseidoni:** Katonda w'ennyanja mu baddayimooni Abagiriki.
*   **Hadesi:** Katonda w'ensi embi mu baddayimooni Abagiriki.

**Eky'omu Kadde: Ensolo z'omu Misiri**

*   **Ra:** Katonda w'enjuba mu baddayimooni Abamisiri.
*   **Isisi:** Kabona omukulu omukyala mu baddayimooni Abamisiri.
*   **Osirisi:** Katonda w'abafu mu baddayimooni Abamisiri.
*   **Horusi:** Katonda w'eggulu mu baddayimooni Abamisiri.

**Eky'omu Kadde: Ensolo z'omu Norse**

*   **Odini:** Katonda omukulu mu baddayimooni Abanorsi.
*   **Tori:** Katonda w'enkuba n'okubwatuka mu baddayimooni Abanorsi.
*   **Loki:** Katonda omulimba mu baddayimooni Abanorsi.
*   **Freyja:** Kabona omukulu omukyala w'obugagga n'omukwano mu baddayimooni Abanorsi.
answer_b: Leeta ebifaananyi ebyawula abazannyi abakulu, abaddako n’abatagasa nnyo mu ngero ze tulonze.
answer_c: Teeka mu mmeeza nga olaga engeri abamu ku bantu abali mu ngero ezo gye bakwatagana n’ebintu ebyogerwako mu ngero ezo.
answer_d: Wandiika obuwandiike obumpi mwe bannyonnyola empisa z'abantu abakulu abali mu ng'ano ze mwalonze.

question: Oluvannyuma lw’omulimu abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’omunaana gwe baakola ogw’okuwandiika omutwe ogulina okumanyisa abantu ebintu ebipya, omusomesa yakiraba nti abasinga obungi mu kibiina balina obuzibu mu kukozesa ennyingo ezikwatagana (co-reference), kubanga batera okuddamu ebigambo bye bimu era tebakozesa ngeri ndala, gamba nga pronoun oba deictics, n’endala. Nkola ki ey’okuyamba eyateekebwawo omusomesa eyinza okuyamba abayizi okunyweza enkozesa y’ennyingo ezikwatagana mu kuwandiika kwabwe?
answer_a: Ddamu weekenneenye ebika by'ebigambo ebikozesebwa okukozesa akakwate k'ebigambo mu mutunzi.
answer_b: Mu kusomesa abayizi, nga okudamu okuyiga, bawe omulagirizi alina entereeza z'amannya amakulu ge gamu, obubaka obusigalawo, n'ebigambo ebiraga obuntu oba ebintu ebyolekedde omuntu, nga mw'otwalidde n'ebyokulabirako ku ngeri gye bikozesebwaamu.
answer_c: Kola okunoonyereza okw'omuwendo mu buli muyizi ng'akolera munne omulimu gwe, ng'asinga kwetegereza engeri gy'akozesezzaamu engeri z'okulaga ebintu bye'yogeraako.
answer_d: Zzaayo omuwandiko eri buli muyizi ng'olambika obubonero ku buli kiddaalizo era obasabe okuguddamu nga baggyawo ebiddalizo nga bakozesa ebigambo ebikuuma amakulu g'ebigambo byonna.

question: Mu kiseera ky’ekitundu ky’eby’emboozi ennyuvu mu kibiina eky’omunaana, omusomesa alina abayizi okusoma ekitundu kino eky’omboozi ennyuvu basobole okutegeera enkolagana wakati w’ebintu ebikolebwa n’ebiri mu mboozi ennyuvu. Alamedas Ettabi ly’emiti gy’emopoopoole giringa olutalo waggulu ettabi lulwana, tulwana wansi w’ebikoola, tubuuka waggulu omubisi, omutumbi gulinnye. Ebikoola birwana okuyita mu mugga ogw’enguudo. Jjangu, kale, wulira bwe buzindaawo mu bbanga emikono emibisi okwolekera obugwanjuba. (Rafael Rubio). Mu bibuuzo bino wammanga, kibuuzo ki ekiyinza okusobozesa abayizi okukwataganya ekifaananyi ekisinga obukulu n’amakulu g’emboozi ennyuvu?
answer_a: Ngeri ki ez'obwongo omutendeke ezikozeseddwa mu kyawandiiko ekyo?
answer_b: Endokwa y'ennyingo z'ebigambo mu mutwe gw'ekyewuunyiso ekigero ekifaanana etya?
answer_c: Waliwo omukwano gwonna wakati w'amaloboozi n'ebigenda mu maaso mu kitontome?
answer_d: Omupimo gwa kyebiriga gukola mulimu ki mu kugaba n'okutegeera ekitontome?

question: Omusomesa, mu kibiina eky'omunaana, ku nkomerero y'essomo ku Mutindo gw'Ebyemizannyo, asaba abayizi okukola omutendera omutono. Bw'amaze okubyekenneenya, asanga omulimu gw'omuyizi omu: Ennyumba ng'endala yonna. Ku ddyo, omwana mu kisenge ng'azannya kompyuta, ate ku kkono, taata ng'ategeka caayi. TAATA: Mwana wange, jangu tunywe caayi. Eno ye mulundi ogw'ekkumi nkugamba. Mwana: Ndiijja, mpa eddakiika ntono. TAATA: (Nga musunguwadde nnyo) Jangu amangu ago! Mwana: Yee, ndiijja, nkyamaliriza muzannyo gwa Free Fire. Naye taata takyasobola kugumiikiriza era agenda ng'asunguwadde okwogera ne mutabani we, okumugamba nti kitya asobola okuba nga yeemaliridde nnyo n'okutuuka obutamala na taata we budde. Mwana: Naye taata, bwa biseera byange eby'omu maaso. Nja kuba omuntu ow'amaanyi mu kuzannya emizannyo! -taata asigala mu kisenge ng'atunuulira omwana we ng'alowooza-. TAATA: Nabadde njagala kugabana naawe akadde konka ke tusobola okubeera awamu. Mwana: Ai, nsonyiwa! Mpa eddakiika 5 zokka nange ŋŋende. Era bweti olunaku olulala bwe lukomekkereza mu maka agabulijjo. Buzibu ki mu nkola y'okuyiga okuwandiika ebiwandiiko by'emizannyo obulabika mu mulimu gw'omuyizi?
answer_a: Otabula olulimi olukozesebwa okwolesa ebikolebwa abazannyi ku siteegi n’olulimi olukozesebwa mu bigambo ebyekusifu.
answer_b: Atabangula ebigambo eby'ekyama n'ebyogerwa abazannyi mu luyimba.
answer_c: Atabula eddoboozi ly'abantu abakola omuzannyo n'eddoboozi ly'omunnabwengula
answer_d: Tategeera mulimu gwa biragiro by'oku siteegi mu muzannyo.

question: Omusomesa akola ku nsonga z'obubonero bw'empandiika n'abayizi be aba 7. Okukola kino, agaba akatabo akalimu dduyiro eno: Soma ekitundu ekiddiring'ana era oteeke akakomera, wekisaanidde, mu kitundu ekisimbiddwa olukoloboze wansi. Sergio Gómez muwandiisi w'empagi, omukulu w'abawandiisi, omusomesa w'Oluyisipaniya, era omuwandiisi Omu-Chile eyeeyunira obuganzi bwe nnyo ku bitabo by'abato by'awandiise, naddala eby'omuseries wa dayirekita omuvubuka Quique Hache. Abayizi bamaliriza omulimu mu ngeri entuufu nga bateeka akakomera mu kitundu ekisimbiddwa olukoloboze wansi oluvannyuma lw'ebigambo: muwandiisi w'empagi era omukulu w'abawandiisi. Kutegeera ki abayizi kwe balina okusooka okuyiga okusobola okuteeka akakomera mu kitundu ekisimbiddwa olukoloboze wansi mu ngeri entuufu?
answer_a: Tegeera ebintu ebirina engeri y’emu mu nnyingo.
answer_b: Londa obutundu obuwerekereza amannya.
answer_c: Londa ekigambo ekiri mu kiyita mu sentensi.
answer_d: Njawulo ki eriwo wakati w'ebigattabigambo ebikozesebwa okugatta ebirowoozo mu sentensi?

question:
Mu kiseera ky'essomo ly'ebitontome mu kibiina eky'omukaaga, mu mbeera y'okukebera, omusomesa asaba abayizi okusoma ekitundu kino okuva mu kitontome kya Nicanor Parra, basobole okukyekenneenya, nga balaga ebintu ebikozesebwa mu lulimi lw'ebitontome.

Ebirooto

Ndiroota emmeeza n'entebe
Ndiroota nga nkyuka mu mmotoka
Ndiroota nga nkola firimu
Ndiroota essundiro ly'amafuta
Ndiroota nga ndi mulambuzi ow'ebbeeyi
Ndiroota nga mperekedde ku musalaba
Ndiroota nga ndya ekyennyanja
Ndiroota nga nsala omutindo
Ndiroota akabonero k'amasannyalaze.

Abayizi ab'enjawulo boogera nti ekitontome tekitegeerekeka kubanga kizzaamu era ennyiriri tezikwatagana.

Nga tutunuulidde ebyo abayizi bye boogedde, kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky'ayinza okubuuza okubalagirira okutegeera ekitontome mu ngeri entuufu?
answer_a: Okuddamu-ddamu okwo n’ekirala ekirabika ng’ekitaliimu makulu kikwatagana kitya n’omutwe gw’omuzimu ogwo?
answer_b: Biki ebikozesebwa mu ngeri y'obuwandiisi ebiri mu kitontome ebitusobozesa okuddamu okutegeera amakulu g'emirongo?
answer_c: Omwogezi mu nnyimba ayagala okulaga ki ng'ayita mu bifaananyi eby'ekirooto by'azimba?
answer_d: Erinnya ly'ekifaananyi ky'ebyogero ekikozesebwa okuddamu ekigambo kye kimu mu nnyiriri eziwerako eziddiring'ana kye ki?

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky'omunaana, mu kiseera ky'essomo ku ngeri y'ebitontome, agenda kukebera okumanya oba abayizi bategeera ekigendererwa kino: "Okutegeera ebikulu ebikola ekitontome." Ku mirimu egiddwa wano, gumu ku gino gw'ogenda kusobozesa okufuna obukakafu obulaga nti ekigendererwa kituukiddwaako?
answer_a: Leeta omuwandiiko ogw'ekyewuwooma era osabe abayizi okuzuula akabonero akali mu kyewuwooma era oluvannyuma basisinkane mu bibinja ebitono okukenneenya akabonero ako ne bannaabwe mu kibiina.
answer_b:
**Sonnet:**

Omukwano, ggwe omuliro ogwaka mu mutima,
Ogusaasaanya ekitangaala mu bulamu bwange bwonna,
Nga njuba bw’eyaka ku nsi mu ttuntu eritaliimu nkonko,
Bw’otyo bw’oyaka mu nda yange, omwoyo gwange ne gusanyuka.

Naye era oli ng’enkuba etonnya mu budde obw’ekire,
Etonnyesa amaziga ag’ennaku n’obuyinike obungi,
Omutima ne gunakuwala, ne gweraliikirira eby’omu maaso,
Nga tewali ssuubi lyonna, wabula ggwe wekka, omukwano.

Nkwagala nnyo, omukwano gwange, okusinga ebintu byonna,
Era ntya nnyo okukufiirwa, kubanga ggwe bulamu bwange,
Naye era nteekwa okukkiriza nti oluusi obulumi buba bwa maanyi,

Era nti oluusi okukwagala kuleeta ennaku n’okubonaabona,
Naye newankubadde ekyo, sigenda kulekera awo kukwagala,
Kubanga ggwe, omukwano, ggwe bulamu bwange bwonna era ggwe ssuubi lyange.

**Free Verse Poem:**

Omukwano,
Gw’oyaka ng’omuliro,
Mu nda y’omutima gwange.
Ggwe kitangaala,
Ekimulisa obulamu bwange bwonna.

Naye era ggwe nkuba,
Etonnyesa amaziga,
Ag’ennaku n’obuyinike.
Omutima gunakuwala,
Gwerarikirira eby’omu maaso.

Nkwagala,
Okusinga byonna.
Ntya okukufiirwa,
Kubanga ggwe bulamu.
Naye oluusi obulumi buba bwa maanyi.

Okukwagala kuleeta ennaku,
N’okubonaabona.
Naye sigenda kulekera awo kukwagala,
Kubanga ggwe bulamu bwange bwonna,
Era ggwe ssuubi lyange.

**Okutandika n’enjawulo wakati w’ebigambululo n’amagambo amakulu ge gamu, gerageranya obufaanananyi n’enjawulo wakati w’ebitontome byombi:**
answer_c: Laga olutontome era osabe abayizi okuzuula omwogezi, ekigendererwa, n'ekintu ekiyimbirwa, okukulaakulanya okwekenneenya kw'omuntu ku bwannamunigina okwawandiikidwa okwogera ku nsonga ezirimu.
answer_d:
**Omuko ogw’Ekiseera**

Omuko gw’ekiseera gutuyita,
Nga bwe gutambula mu bwangu,
Ebiseera byaffe tubimalira wa?
Eby’omuwendo tubireka ennyuma.

Enjuba evaayo n’omusaayi,
Ebunenya obulamu bwaffe obutaliimu,
Empewo ekunta ebituuka,
Nga bwe tukyekera eby’olubeerera.

Emirembe gy’ensi gijja ne gitambula,
Nga bwe tutunuulira obwereere,
Eby’omuwendo tubisuula wala,
Mu kifo ky’okubikuuma mu mutima.

Omuko gw’ekiseera gutuyita,
Nga bwe gutambula mu bwangu,
Tuleme kwerabira eby’omuwendo,
Tukuumire ddala eby’olubeerera.

**Ebibuuzo:**

1.  Mu nnyiriri eno mulimu emigongo minga?
2.  Mu nnyiriri eno mulimu stanza minga?
3.  Ennyiriri zino zirina oluyimba olugenda okufaanagana? Bwe kiba kityo, lwaki?
4.  Ennyiriri zino zirina meter? Bwe kiba kityo, lwaki?
5.  Laga engeri eziranga ennyiriri zino.
6.  Mu nnyiriri zino mulimu ebifaananyi eby’obuwandiisi? Bwe kiba kityo, byoleke.

question: Omusomesa ow’ekibiina eky’omusanvu agenda kukola akakodyo k’okukebera okumanya oba abayizi bategeera eky’omusango ekiri mu muzannyo: Okukola kino, agenda kukozesa abayizi be omuzannyo nga bagusoma mu ngeri ey’okuguzannya. Ku bino wammanga, kiki ekiraga nti abayizi bategeera eky’omusango ekiri mu muzannyo?
answer_a: Banannyonnyola ebikolwa by'omutontomi omukulu n'omuzigu mu kitabo ekyasomeddwa
answer_b: Balaga engeri omuntu omukulu n’omuzigu gye balabikamu mu buli katundu.
answer_c: Balaga ekyo omuzikiriza omukulu n’omuzikiriza omulabe kye baagala oba bye beegomba mu mulimu ogusomeddwa
answer_d: Bawaayo omusango ku nneeyisa y'omutontomi omukulu n'omuzigu mu mulimu ogusomeddwa.

question: Omusomesa, mu kibiina eky’omwaka ogw’okubiri mu siniya, agenda kukola okunoonyereza n’abayizi ku byafaayo by’ebitabo eby’Omulembe Ogwa Zaabu, ng’asingira ku mpisa n’embeera y’ebyafaayo ey’ekiseera ekyo. Oluvannyuma lw’okunoonyereza ku intaneeti, abayizi bagenda kuteeka awamu olukalala lw’ebitabo olugazi, ate oluvannyuma balonde ebiwandiiko ebisinga okuba ebituufu okusinziira ku kigendererwa ky’okunoonyereza. Ku mirimu gino wammanga omusomesa gy’ateese, gumu ku gyo gw’osanga nga gwe gusinga okuba omutuufu okulonda ebiwandiiko ebinoonyerezeddwako?
answer_a: Teekawo empandiika y'ebitabo ebyakozesebwa okunoonyereza era olondeko ekijja okukozesebwa.
answer_b: Sooka osome ebiwandiiko mu bujjuvu okusobola okutegeera ensonga enkulu, oluvannyuma weerabirire obukulu bw'amawulire ago okusinziira ku bigendererwa by'okunoonyereza.
answer_c: Kozesa enkola okumanya omutwe n'ekigendererwa ekikulu eky'obubaka obuli mu buli kitabo ky'oyambiddwa era oluvannyuma okukungaanya ebimanyiddwa okusinziira ku mitwe emito, okusinziira ku kigendererwa ky'okunoonyereza.
answer_d: Nkoonya ensumbi z’ebigambo nga oziggyamu eby’obuwangwa by’omu makkati era oluvannyuma okole entegeka z’ebifaananyi n’ebigambo ebiyambako mu kunoonyereza.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ekyokuna mu siniya, mu mutwe gw'eby'emikutu gy'ebiwandiiko eby'omulembe (literary avant-gardes), asoma era n'akebera n'abayizi ekiwandiiko kya Dadaist Manifesto, n'ekigendererwa eky'okubayamba okutegeera engeri abatetenkanya ba Dada bwe baatetenkanyanga. Abayizi abamu balaga nti tebasobola kutegeera ngeri y'okutetenkanya. Kintu ki eky'obuwandiisi ky'osobola okusaba abayizi okukolako, okukwasaganya ebizibu ebyajjawo mu kibiina?
answer_a:
Kozesa akatiiko akakola ebigambo mu ngeri eno:

**M**anyisa amakulu g'ekigambo
**P**ima bulungi ebigambo by'okozesa
**I**gambile ddala ekyo ky'oyagala okutegeeza
**N**oonya ebigambo ebirungi
**D**damu okukenenula by'owandiise
answer_b: N'omuwandiiko ogw'ekika kya "anti-poem"
answer_c: N'omumenyaamagumba
answer_d: N'omulambo omulungi ennyo

question: Omusomesa, mu kibiina ekyokubiri mu siniya, mu somo erikwata ku biwandiiko by'abayimbi okuva mu mulembe ogwa zaabu, akolera ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okutegeera ensonga lwaki omuyimbi yawandiika ennyimba ez'enjawulo." Okukola kino, asoma wamu n'abayizi oluyimba olugeraano luno: Okwagala kutandika n'obutawumula, okusaba, okwagala ennyo, n'obutulo; kukula n'obuvune, amafumu, n'okwekalakaasa; kwekuuma n'okukaaba n'okwegayirira. Obutaba na bwesige mu njigiriza n'okukankana, kwekuuma okubeera wakati mu bbugumu eririmba, okutuusa ng'ennyombo oba obuggya buzikirizza omuliro gwakwo n'amaziga gaakwo. Entandikwa yakwo, wakati waakwo n'enkomerero yakwo bye bino: kale lwaki, AlciNo, owulira okukyama kwa Celia, eyali akwagala ennyo? Nsonga ki eriwo eky'obulumi okukutawaanya? Kubanga okwagala tekwakulimbye, AlciNo wange, wabula ekiseera ekituufu kyatuuka. (Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz). Abayizi abawerako boogera nti tebasobola kutegeera nsonga lwaki omuyimbi yawandiika oluyimba kubanga balina ebigambo bye bataamanya. Mulimu ki omusomesa gw'asaanidde okuteesa abayizi basobole okutegeera ensonga lwaki omuyimbi yawandiika oluyimba?
answer_a: Abayizi balonda ebigambo ebizibu okutegeera mu kitontome era ne bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku makulu gaabyo agayinza okubaawo ne bannaabwe.
answer_b: Abayizi bateebereza amakulu agayinza okuba mu bigambo ebikalu era ne bakakasa amakulu ago nga bayambibwa omusomesa.
answer_c: Abayizi balowooza ku makulu ge bawa ebigambo ebikalu ne bawandiika sentensi nga bakozesa ebigambo ebyo.
answer_d: Abayizi balonda ebigambo ebizibu okutegeera ne babisikiza ebirala, okusinziira ku bumanyirivu bwabwe obusooka, ebirina amakulu ge gamu.

question: Omusomesa, mu kibiina ky’omwaka ogusooka mu siniya, akulembera ekibinja okusoma olugero El padre, olwa Olegario Lazo, ng’alina ekigendererwa okukakasa, mu kusoma, oba abayizi bategeera kye basoma. Nkola ki ey’okutegeera by’osoma eyandibadde etuukirawo okutuukiriza ekigendererwa ky’okuyiga ekyo?
answer_a: Abayizi bakunganya ebyo bye basoma.
answer_b: Abayizi balondoola ebirowoozo ebikulu ennyo mu lugero
answer_c: Abayizi babumba ebibuuzo ebikwata ku bye basoma era ne babiddamu.
answer_d: Abayizi bakwataganya amawulire okuva mu lubalo ku byo bye bayitamu.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina ky’abakulu mu mwaka ogwokusatu, anyweza omutindo gw’okutegeera ebyo omuntu by’asoma. Okukola kino, aleeta ekitundu kino wammanga okwekenneenya: Ekifaananyi Kyange Nze Mwennyini. Maze emyaka esatu n’emyezi esatu nga ndi bweru w’eggwanga. Nsinga kwagala kutunula ku kkono. Omunywanyi gwange omu anyumirwa okulyamu munne olukwe. Enkomerero y’olugendo yandekerawo obunaku bwe bumu ng’enkomerero y’ekitabo. Yeerabira bye saagala. Kisoboka nti njogedde n’omuntu atta omuntu omulala nga simanyi. Nja kunoonya mu makubo agaggwaamu. Ekyo ekiri ku nkomerero y’obulamu tekintiisa. Mu butuufu, siwuliriza bye mbagambwa. Nneewuunya okumpa erinnya ery’ekiddukiro nga simanyi bulungi. Kimmala ebiseera okukiriza nti omuntu yeyisa bubi gyendi; kirabika nga kyewuunyisa nti ekintu ng’ekyo kiyinza okubaawo gyendi: obubi, mu ngeri emu, si bwe mpisa. Tereka. Nga ndi wa myaka ebiri, nayogera ne Salvador Dalí. Empaka tezinkubiriza. Okunnyonnyola obulamu bwange mu butuufu kyandintwalidde ebiseera bingi okusinga okubutambuliramu. Oluvannyuma lw’okusoma, abayizi abamu boogera nti tebategeera engeri sentensi ez’enjawulo gye zikwatagana mu kiwandiiko. Kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okubuuza okulung’amya abayizi mu kwekenneenya ekitundu kino ekigguddewo?
answer_a: Okugera olukalala lw'ebintu ebitaliiko makulu kikwatagana kitya n'omutwe gw'ekitabo?
answer_b: Kukwatagana ki okuyinza okussibwawo wakati w'omukubi w'ebifaananyi Salvador Dalí n'ebikolwa ebyogeddwako?
answer_c: Kyakozesebwa ki mu nnimi ezaakozesebwa mu katabo kano ekiriwo mu biwandiiko by'ennaku zino?
answer_d: Endowooza y'omuwandiisi ekwatagana etya n'ebintu by'alambika?

question: Omusomesa omukulu mu kibiina eky’okuna, mu kitundu ky’ebyafaayo ebipya, agenda mu maaso n’okuddamu okuyigiriza ku nkola z’ebyafaayo ebipya. Oluvannyuma lw’okunnyonnyola amakulu g’eddoboozi ennyingi mu byafaayo n’okuwa ebyokulabirako, akizuula nti abayizi abamu tebannategeera bulungi kye kitegeeza. Okwanguya okutegeera, asalawo okunnyonnyola ensonga eno ng’ayitira mu lugero. Lugero ki omusomesa lw’ayinza okukozesa okwanguya okutegeera eddoboozi ennyingi mu byafaayo?
answer_a: Ekibiina ky'abayimbi ekya ssomero kiyimba oluyimba lw'essomero ku mukolo gw'eggwanga.
answer_b: Omukwano ogumu gusisinkana oluvannyuma lw'oluwummula okugabana ebifaananyi byabwe n'ebyo bye bayitamu.
answer_c: Omuntu ali mu kisaawe era n'ayogera ku nneeyisa y'abaana abakilizaawo.
answer_d: Omufumbo gw’ebimuli bwe gugwa okuva ku bbalakoni ne gugwa ku mmotoka eyimiridde, abalabye boogera bye baalabye.

question: Omusomesa omukulu mu mwaka ogw’olubereberye, akolera ku kigendererwa kino: "Okutegeera obutuufu n’obukakafu bw’ebigambo ebiva mu nsibuko ez’enjawulo." Mu ngeri eno, asaba abayizi okwekenneenya amawulire agakwata ku bigezo by’obusimu. Kiki eky’okukola ekyandibadde ekituufu okutegeeza abayizi okutuukiriza ekigendererwa kino eky’okuyiga?
answer_a: Londa ensibuko kkumi ez’enjawulo ezikwata ku mulamwa gwe gumu, oluvannyuma ozigeregeranye era olonde ebimu ku byo ebifaanagana ebirabika mu bungi bw’amawulire agaalondeddwa.
answer_b: Noonyereza ku njatula ez’enjawulo ezikwata ku mutwe ogwo, oluvannyuma nonya mawulire ge ziwandiika ku gwo n’ekitongole ekiwagira omutwe ogwo.
answer_c: Tegeka okusisinkana omukugu gwe bamanyi era alina obumanyirivu ku mutwe gw'ekigambo okumubuuza ebibuuzo ebyajjawo mu kunoonyereza, oluvannyuma oggweerezeeko.
answer_d: Nkola omubazi gw'ebibuuzo ku bantu abawagira n'abatawakanya okugemebwa, oluvannyuma oteekeewo eby'avaamu okusinziira ku bigendereddwaamu.

question: Mu mwaka ogw’olubereberye, omusomesa w’essomero lya secondary asomesa ku nnongoosereza y’ebigambo mu kuwandiika ebintu ebikulu, ng’alowooza ku bintu ebirala, okukkanya okutuufu kw’ebikolwa. Mu mbeera eno, omuyizi abuuza lwaki okukozesa ekikolwa ‘okubaawo’ mu bumu kuteekwa okukolebwa mu sentensi nga ‘Waabaddewo obuzibu bungi mu ntambula y’ebyenjigiriza’, so si ‘Waabaddewo obuzibu bungi mu ntambula y’ebyenjigiriza’, singa ebigoberera biri mu bungi: ‘obuzibu bungi’. Kubanga kulonda ki okuva eri omusomesa kwe kwandisobozesezza okuddamu omuyizi mu ngeri entuufu era etegeerekeka?
answer_a: Enjogera 'Waaliwo' eraga obubaawo bw'ebintu oba embeera, era mu mbeera eno, ekoleezebwa mu sentensi ey'obukozi obw'ekigattako omutwe gw'ekigambo, 'enkola y'ebyenjigiriza', ekola ng'ekigattako ekikola ekintu ekisinga okubeera nga kirindiriddwa ku nkomerero y'ekisentensi.
answer_b: Enjogera ‘Waaliwo’ tekyoleka nti kikwatagana n’omuwendo gw’ekitundu ky’omusenteensi ‘ebizibu bingi’, wabula kikwatagana ne ‘nkola y’ebyenjigiriza’, ekikola ng’omutwe gw’omusenteensi guno, bwatyo etteeka ly’ennimi erikwata ku kukwatagana wakati w’omutwe n’ekikolwa libeera lituukiriziddwa.
answer_c: Ennyingo 'Waaliwo' ekwatagana n'ekigambululo ky'erinnya 'ebizibu bingi', kubanga kino kitundu ku kigambulwa kyakyo. N'olwekyo, okuba nti akatundu kano kali mu bungi tekirina kinene kye kikola ku nnyingo, kubanga mu mbeera eno, enkula y'ennyingo 'okubaako' ekolebwaamu ng'ennyingo ey'obuyambi ey'endala esuuliddwa.
answer_d: Ennyingo 'Waaliwo' eraga obubaawo bw'ekyo ekiragiddwa oluvannyuma lwa 'ebizibu bingi', ekikola ng'ekigobererwa ekikulu mu sentensi eno etalina mugiramu. Okuba nti kirabika mu bungi tekitegeeza nti ennyingo erina kubeera, kuba erina okukwatagana n'omugiramu, so si n'ekigobererwa ekikulu.

question: Omusomesa omukulu mu kibiina eky’okuna, akolera wamu n’abayizi be ku nkolagana y’ebiwandiiko, ng’ayita mu kusoma olugero olumpi bwati: Omubiiru eyeebase aziba amaaso ge naye teyeebaka. Alindirira omulangira. Era bw’awulira ng’amusemberera, yeefuula ng’ayeebase nnyo okusingawo. Tewali amugambye, naye amanyi. Amanyi nti tewali mulangira ayitawo omukazi alina amaaso ge nga gagguddewo. Oluvannyuma lw’okusoma, omuyizi awaayo ekirowoozo kino: “Mu lugero luno olumpi, nga bwe kiri mu lugero olwa bulijjo, Omubiiru eyeebase akyalindirira omulangira. Mu ngeri endala, omuzira w’olugero ye mulangira.” Okuddamu ekirowoozo kino, kibuuzo ki omusomesa ky’ayinza okubuuza okukulembera omuyizi okukola ennyonnyola entuufu ku nkolagana y’ebiwandiiko eriwo mu lugero olumpi olwo?
answer_a: Ebintu ki ebikulu ebiri mu katemba akampi ennyo bye tulaba nga bifaanana n’ebyo ebiri mu lugero olwa bulijjo?
answer_b: Olowooza nti empisa z'abantu abali mu katemba omumpi zikyakwatagana n'embeera z'ennaku zino?
answer_c: Ngeri ki abantu abasinga obukulu mu ngero zombi gye balina?
answer_d: Lwaki Omuwala Omwebase ow’omu katabo akampi ayefuula ng’ebase, obutafaanana ng’ow’olubereberye?

question:
Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’okubiri mu Ssomero erya wakati, akolera wamu n’abayizi be ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okutegeera obuyinza ebifaananyi eby’obuwandiisi bye bireeta mu ngeri z’ebitontome." Okukituukako, omusomesa abasaba okusoma ebitontome eby’enjawulo era n’abasaba okutegeera ebifaananyi eby’obuwandiisi ebirimu, basobole oluvannyuma okwekenneenya obuyinza enkozesa y’ebifaananyi bino bw’erina ku makulu g’ekitontome mu bujjuvu. Ekimu ku bitontome by’aleeta kye kino:

EMBWA

Obudde buwulirwa ng’obuseeyeeya ku lususu
ng’olulimi lw’embwa bwe luli
olwewunzifu, olubuguma, olukakanyala katono

Osobola okuwulira enjala zaayo:
era ekitusigalawo kyonna
bye bifu by’embaga esirise

Obudde bubuuka era ne busima mu kasasiro
era ne busanga amaggwa gokka

(Óscar Hahn).

Omusomesa, bw’amala okwekenneenya eby’abayizi bye baddamu, akizuula nti bangi ku bo balaga nti okugeraageranya kye kifaananyi ekisinga obukulu mu kitontome kubanga embwa egeraageranyizibwa ku kuyita kw’obudde.

Kibuuzo ki okuva eri omusomesa ekiyinza okuyamba abayizi okutegeera olufaananyi ng’ekifaananyi ekisinga obukulu mu kitontome?
answer_a: Kiki ekikozesebwa mu bigambo ekiyamba okutegeera amakulu g'omuzimu?
answer_b: Ebintu ki omubazi by'alina mu katemba?
answer_c: Mukwano ki oguteekeddwawo wakati w'empisa z'ekika ky'embwa n'okuyita kw'ebiseera?
answer_d: Omwogezi mu nnyimba alaga birowoozo ki ng’ayita mu kifaananyi ky’ekisolo ekifaanana ng’akatooke?

question: Omusomesa w’ekibiina eky’okubiri mu siniya, oluvannyuma lw’okukola akakube mu buwandiisi omuyizi kwe yali alina okuwa endowooza ye ku katabo, akebera ebiwandiiko bino okuva ku omu ku bo: Akatabo kaleeta ensonga enzibu ennyo ekwata ku buteesigangana wakati w’abantu abali mu katabo. Akatabo kategekeddwa mu bitundu bisatu, bwatyo akatabo kizibu okutegeera. Mu nkomerero, akatabo kandeetera okulowooza ku butaba na busaasizi mu nsi mwe tubeera, nga mu katabo, omuntu Pedro, atayamba nnyina we bwe yamwetaaga. Ku ndowooza zino wammanga, endiwa omusomesa gy’awa omuyizi okutereeza engeri ebiwandiiko bye byegattiddwamu y’eriwa?
answer_a: Lwetaaga okukozesa ennyingo ezikozesebwa okwogera ku kintu ekimaze okwogerwako okutereeza omutindo gw'ebyo by'owandiika.
answer_b: Okutwalira awamu, ebifa mu katabo kano
answer_c: Muwandiike omuzingo ogumala okukakasa nti ekitabo ky'obuwangwa kigwanidde okusomwa abayizi mu Siniya ey'okuna. Lowooza ku buwandiike bw'ekitabo, obukulu bw'ebigendererwa byakyo, n'engeri gye kiyinza okukwatagana n'ebyetaago by'abayizi.
answer_d: Ekiwandiiko kilemererwa mu nkolagana zaakyo ennyonnyofu nga kigwamu okwejjusa ebigambo.

question: Omusomesa ow’omwaka ogwokusatu, mu kiseera ky’essomo ly’okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu lwatu, akola omulimu gw’okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikwaata ku kukozesa amaanyi mu ngeri entuufu. Mu mbeera eno, omuyizi omu awolereza eky’okukubiriza abantu obutasaasaanya maanyi. Omuyizi omulala awakanya endowooza eno, ng’alowooza nti kiyinza okuba ekizibu okusalawo obanga okukozesa amaanyi kusaasaanya oba tekwasaasaanya. Omusomesa asaba omuyizi eyasooka okuddamu okutegeeza endowooza ye. Nkola ki eyinza okuyamba omuyizi okuddamu okutegeeza endowooza ye mu ngeri entuufu mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno?
answer_a: Okukozesa enkulukuta eziddiring'ana okutegeeza ku bintu ebijjawo olw'okwonoona amasannyalaze
answer_b: Okukozesa enkwaso ezigattika okwongera ku birowoozo ebikwata ku ngeri endala ezitaliimu bulungi ez’okukozesa amaanyi.
answer_c: Okukozesa enkulukuta ezannyonnyola okumanya amakulu amatuufu agakola okusaanyaawo amasannyalaze.
answer_d: Okukozesa ennyingo eziraga obuzibu okusobola okwawula mu buceerefu engeri ezitali zimu emannyo gisobola okusaanyizibwaamu.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’omukaaga akolera wamu n’abayizi okutegeera embeera ezeesigamiziddwa ku ngeri ebiwandiiko by’ebiyiiye gye bitegekeddwamu. Okukola kino, awamu n’ekibiina, akola okusoma kuno: Tusobola okutuula mu kisiikirize era ne tulowooza ku lusuku? Eby’obulamu ebinakuwavu bikula. Emitti gituzingizza era mu mimiro gyagyo empanvu obusirifu bwe bwereekereza. (Omusaayi gwaffe era gukaaba, omugga omukwafu ogutandikira era ne guggweera mu ffe). Okusinga ffe, ensozi enzito zituyimiriza era omwezi gulinnya ng’eriiso. (Entambuza y’Amazzi, Alicia Montal). Nkola ki omusomesa gy’ayinza okuteesa eri abayizi okwongera okutegeera embeera ezeesigamiziddwa mu biwandiko by’ebiyiiye ebisomeddwa?
answer_a: Londa engeri z'ebyogero eziri mu kitontome.
answer_b: Kyakuddira ki eky'omutwe omulala ky'owaandiika ku ngeri emboozi eno bw'eri?
answer_c: Laga engeri engeri z'olusozi gye zikwatagana n'ebyo omwogezi by'alaga.
answer_d: Laga ebintu ebisinga okweyoleka mu nnimiro abayizi bye bamanyi n’enneewulira ze zireeta.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky'okutaano akola ku kukozesa langi okuyamba abayizi okwawula endowooza enkulu mu biwandiiko ebitali bya buzannyo. Mu biseera by'ebikolebwa, omusomesa akiraba nti abayizi bakozesa langi ku bitundu bingi by'ekiwandiiko kye bakolerako, nga tebawula wakati w'ebikulu n'ebitakulu. Ku bikolebwa bino wammanga, kiki ekisobozesa abayizi okwawula endowooza enkulu ez'ekiwandiiko?
answer_a: Ebiteeso bya magezi byolekeddwa nga bikozesa ekibuuzo kino: biteeso ki ebimanyiddwa mu buli katundu?
answer_b: Okay, I understand. Please provide the text you want me to translate. I will provide the Luganda translation, with the topic of each paragraph written before it.
answer_c: Ebiri mu buli katundu ebyewuunyisa bye biki?
answer_d: Lwaki endowooza eza sekendulezi zongera ku paragulaafu?

question: Mu kibiina kya munaana, omusomesa asaba abayizi okusoma olugero olumpi oluyitibwa 'Olugero' olwa Wislawa Szymborska ate oluvannyuma bakole ebibuuzo ebiyamba okutegeera obulungi ebyo ebiri mu lugero. Abalenzi abamu abavubi baaggya eccupa okuva wansi mu nnyanja. Munda mu ccupa mwalimu olupapula, era ku lupapula kwaliko ebigambo bino: "Muyambe!, Ndi wano. Ennyanja ensumuludde ku kizinga etaliiwo bantu. Ndi ku lubalama era ndinda obuyambi. Mwanguyiriza! Ndi wano!" –Tewali lunaku. Kijja kuba nga kiyiseewo ebbanga ddene. Eccupa yandiba nga emaze ebbanga ddene nga etengejja – omulenzi omuvubi eyasooka bwe yagambye. –Era ekifo tekiragiddwa. Tekimanyiddwa wadde nnyanja ki – omulenzi omuvubi owookubiri bwe yagambye. –Si kya lubeerera wadde kya wala. Ekizinga 'Wano' kiri buli wantu – omulenzi omuvubi owookusatu bwe yagambye. Embeera yafuuka mbi, obusirise ne bubaawo. Amazima agawamu galina ekizibu ekyo. Mu bibuuzo bino ebyakolebwa abayizi, kibuuzo ki ekikulembera okutegeera amakulu g'olugero olusomeddwa?
answer_a: Ennyingo "Wano" buli wantu kitegeeza ki?
answer_b: Enkomerero y’olugero yandibadde etya singa obubaka bwali butegerekeka bulungi?
answer_c: Lwaki abavubi tebawulira bulungi n’ekiddamu ky’omusajja owookusatu?
answer_d: Singa wandisangyeewo eccupa erimu obubaka ng’obwo, wandikoze ki era lwaki?

question: Omusomesa akola ku kufulumya biwandiiko ebikwata ku by’amawulire n’abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw’okutaano, ng’agoberera enteekateeka y’okuwandiika. Mulimu ki omutuufu abayizi okwekenneenya obutonde bwonna obw’ebiwandiiko byabwe?
answer_a: Soma enteekateeka esooka era okole akatafaali k'endowoza. Oluvannyuma, weekenneenye omukutu gw'ensonga oguvaamu era, bwe kiba kyetaagisa, ddamu okutegeka ebiri mu nteekateeka esooka.
answer_b: Soma empandiika eno era okole olukalala lw'ebirowoozo ebiri mu mpandiika eno. Oluvannyuma, kebera oba waliwo amawulire agetaaga okwongerwako okusobola okuteekawo omusingi omugumu ku mpandiika eno.
answer_c: Soma enteekateeka eno eri muyizi munno era omusabe okugyetegereza, ng'amulaga obuzibu bwonna obuliwo obw'obunnyuvu oba okuddabiriza. Oluvannyuma, olongoosa enteekateeka eno okusinziira ku magezi agabaweereddwa muyizi munno.
answer_d: Soma olusirafiiti era olutondeke.

question: Omusomesa agenda kukolera wamu n'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'omukaaga ku biwandiiko ebirimu okukaayana. Okusobola okubalaga engeri zaabyo, abalaga eky'obulango ekiddako: TUTEREKE AMAZZI! TUBEERE BAVUNAANYIZIBWA MU BISEERA BY'EBBULA. www.inae.gob.h Omuyizi agolola omukono gwe n'abuuza lwaki eky'obulango ekiri waggulu kibaliddwa ng'ekiwandiiko ekirimu okukaayana so si ng'ekiwandiiko ekiwa amawulire, okuva bwe kigaba amawulire agatuufu ku muwendo gw'amazzi agasaanyizibwawo nga baggulawo akatebe k'amazzi okumala eddakiika 1. Mu bikolwa by'omusomesa ebiddako, kiki ekiddamu ekibuuzo ky'omuyizi?
answer_a: Olwokubanga okuwa amawulire mu lanngiisa kyakulabirako eri omuguzi okumanya ebintu ebikulu ebikwata ku kintu ekyo ekitundibwa gyali
answer_b: Olw’okuba okulangisa, okufaanana ng’okumanyisa, kulina omulimu gw’okuwoowooya, nga kirina ekigendererwa nti omuwuliriza anywerera ku ndowooza oba okukozesa ekintu.
answer_c: Olw’okuba okulangisa kiyinza okuwa amawulire ng’engeri y’okukakasa, kwe kugamba, ng’engeri y’okumatiza abantu okukwatagana n’endowooza gy’ekiwaayo.
answer_d: Olw’okuba ebika by’ebiwandiiko tebiraga buli kiseera buzibu bw’olulimi oluli mu biwandiiko, nga bwe kiri mu lanno lino erigenderera okumanyisa n’okuwoomera omutima omuntu.

question: Mu kibiina kya P5, omusomesa agenda kukebera okumanya kw'abayizi be ku nkola y'emizannyo. Okukola kino, akola enteekateeka z'ebintu eby'enjawulo ebigenda okumuyamba okunoonya obukakafu obulaga ebyo bye bayize. Mu bintu bino ebigenda okukeberwa, kiki ekiraga okutegeera obuzibu obubeera mu mizannyo?
answer_a: Wawulaana ebikolwa ebikolebwa abantu abakola omuzannyo.
answer_c: Laga ensonga eziviiriddeko omuzannyi omukulu n’omuzannyi omubi okukola bye bakola mu muzannyo.
answer_d: Laga engeri ebikolwa by'omuntu omukulu n'omulabe mu muzannyo gye bikwatagana n'ebyo bye bayitamu.

question: Omusomesa ow'ekitabo ky'omukaaga atalaaga, ng'ayita mu mirimu egy'enjawulo omuli ebibuuzo eby'eggulo, ekigendererwa kino: "Okwekenneenya mu ngeri ennung'amu amawulire agali mu biwandiiko ebitali bya bitabo, okusinziira ku bigendererwa byabyo n'engeri gye bifaanana." Okukola kino, awa abayizi be omulimu guno ogw'okwekenneenya: Soma ekiwandiiko kino oluvannyuma oddemu ebibuuzo. Sigala mu Musenyu Omwami Omukulu: Nina emyaka 12 era, nga buli kyeya, nagenda ku lubalama n'ab'eka yange. Bwe nnali nziruka mu musenyu, nasanze sigala nnyingi ezisuuliddwa wansi. Okuva bwe nnali omuto, kinnumye nnyo nti ebbaketi erimu sigala nnyingi okusinga omusenyu. Noolwekyo, nnalowoozezza ku kuwandiikira amawulire okusaba abasomi bonna abanywa sigala okusaba okugezaako obutanywera ku lubalama. Era bwe baba banywa, okusaba obutasuula ebikuta mu musenyu. Mu ngeri eyo, ffe abaana tusobola okuziruka mu musenyu n'omusenyu, so si ne sigala. Ignacia Tokman Herrera www.biohechil.cl Kiki ekigendererwa ky'ebbaluwa Ignacia Tokman ky'awandiise? Lwaki? Omu ku bayizi addamu bwati: "Ekigendererwa kya Ignacia kwe kusobola okuziruka n'omusenyu bw'agenda ku lubalama, kubanga ky'ayagala okukola okusinziira ku by'awandiika mu bbaluwa." Omusomesa amugamba: "Yee!, oli mutuufu, okusinziira ku by'awandiika, Ignacia ayagala okusobola okuziruka ku lubalama n'omusenyu ogutalina bikuta." Kibuuzo ki ku bino wammanga ekiyamba ku ky'omusomesa ky'ayogedde omuyizi asobole okukwata obulungi ekigendererwa ky'okutalaaga?
answer_a: Naye ddala aleetera ani ebbaluwa ye?
answer_b: Kyakyuka ki ky'ayagala okuleetawo ng'ayita mu bbaluwa ye?
answer_c: Obusungu bwe bwannyonnyoddwa mu bbaluwa butegeeza ki?
answer_d: Nsonga lwaki ekibuuzo ekigguddwa mu bbaluwa ye kikulu eri buli omu?

question: Omusomesa akolera wamu n'abayizi abali mu mwaka ogw'omusanvu ku kuwandiika omutwe ogulina ekigendererwa eky'okuwakanya ku by'enkulakulana y'ensi yonna. Mu mutendera ogw'okuddamu okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko, omusomesa alina ekigendererwa eky'okukakasa oba abayizi basobodde okukyusa ebiwandiiko byabwe okutuukana n'ebigendererwa by'omutwe ogw'okuwakanya ku lw'okwanjula obulungi endowooza zaabwe. Omu ku bayizi awaayo ekiwandiiko kino: Emigaso gy'enkulakulana y'ensi yonna Mu kiseera kino, olw'enkulakulana y'ensi yonna, tusobola okutambula ensi yonna n'okwogera n'abantu wonna we bali. Ate era, Chile etunda ebibala oba ebintu ebirala ebweru, era ebikozesebwa by'amasannyalaze ebiva ebweru bikolebwa mu bifo nga Bulaaya, Amerika, oba China. Mu ngeri eno, tusobola okugabana mu bantu bonna ebintu eby'enjawulo ebikolebwa mu nsi zaffe. Ku bino ebitegeezebwa omusomesa, kiki ekikubiriza omuyizi okutereezaamu enkozesa ye ku nsonga eyo ey'okutereeza omutwe?
answer_a: Wayolesezza bulungi ebintu ebirungi ebiri mu nkulakulana y'ensi yonna. Naye oyinza otya okukakasa abasomi bo nti okukulakulana kw'ensi yonna kugasa?
answer_b: Olw'olaze engeri ennungi ez'omulembe gw'ensi yonna gy'okutte bulungi, oyinza otya okutegeeza abasomi bo ebivaamu eby'enjawulo eby'omulembe gw'ensi yonna?
answer_c: Olw’okuba onnyonnyodde bulungi ebimu ku bintu ebirungi ebiva mu mugatte gw’ensi yonna, onnyonnyola otya mu sentensi emu oba endowooza emu ky’olowooza ku mugatte gw’ensi yonna?
answer_d: Olwolesse bulungi ebintu ebirungi ebiva mu kutabaganya ensi yonna. Naye oyinza otya okunnyonnyola obuzibu obw’enjawulo obuleetebwawo okutabaganya ensi yonna eri abantu?

question: Omusomesa, mu kibiina eky’omwaka ogw’okubiri mu Ssomero lya wakati, akolera ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okukozesa engeri z'okuwandiika ez'enjawulo obutayosa." Oluvannyuma lw’okubalaga eby’okulabirako by’engeri ez’enjawulo n’okuddamu ebibuuzo by’abayizi, abasaba okuwandiika akatabo akampi mu ngeri y’obuwandiisi obutali butereevu, nga basinziira ku katabo kano akampi: Mu kuddamu omulimu guno, omuyizi agamba omusomesa: "Sinnategeera ngeri y’okuwandiika etali butereevu bw’enkozesa. Osobola okunnyonnyola engeri gye nkikolamu?". Mu biragiro bino wammanga ebiruwa okuva eri omusomesa ebikulembera omuyizi mu kutondawo akatabo mu ngeri etali butereevu?
answer_a: Yingera olukubagano lw’ebigambo n’abantu abalonde okuva mu katundu ako, ng’obakkiriza okwogera ku lwabwe. Bw’omala okutegeera olukubagano lw’ebigambo, luwandiike.
answer_b: Laba buli muntu okuva mu katambi era olowooze ebyafaayo ebimwewoloola. Oluvannyuma, wandiika ebirowoozo by’abantu abo mu byafaayo ebyo.
answer_c:
Waakiri buli muntu mu katemba akawandiikire erinnya era owandiike olugero olumpi olulimu ebigambo ebitandika, okukozesa obutondo, n’endowooza ez’enjawulo ku buli muntu.

**Olugero:**

Mu kabuga k’e Kisaasi, abantu bana be baali beegattiddwa olw’omukwano n’obulamu: Maria, omusomesa; Musa, omulimi; Nakato, omuyizi; ne Sserunjogi, omusuubuzi.

**Maria:**

Maria yalowooza nti: Obulamu bwange bwonna mbumalidde mu kusomesa abaana b’omukono, naye oluusi nneebuuza oba ddala mbayamba okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Leero, nteekwa kulaba nti Nakato awangula ekigezo kye eky’akamalirizo: nteekwa kumuyamba okutegeera buli kimu.

**Musa:**

Musa yeebuuza: Empewo zikyuka buli kiseera, naye emmere yaffe egenda kimala? Nnina okukola ennyo: okusimba emmere, okugigabira ebigimusa, n’okugikuuma. Naye olwaleero, nteekwa okuyamba Nakato okusoma: omwana oyo alina okusoma asobole okukyusa obulamu bwe.

**Nakato:**

Nakato yagamba: Okusoma kuno kunzitoowerera! Naye nkimanyi nti nteekwa okusoma nsobole okutuuka ku birooto byange: okufuuka omusawo nnyambe abalwadde. Nnina okusoma nnyo leero: nteekwa okuyiga buli kimu Maria ne Musa bye bantegeeza.

**Sserunjogi:**

Sserunjogi yalowooza: Bizinensi yange yeetaaga okukulaakulana, naye abantu bano beetaaga obuyambi bwange okusinga. Nnina okubawa ebintu bye beetaaga: ebitabo, engoye, n’emmere. Naye leero, nteekwa okubayamba okusoma: okusoma kwe kyakubayamba okukyusa obulamu bwabwe.
answer_d:
**Verbatim Dialogue:**

**Teacher:** Good morning, class. Today, we're going to start learning about fractions. Can anyone tell me what a fraction is?

**Student 1:** Um, is it like, a part of something?

**Teacher:** That's a good start. Can you be more specific?

**Student 2:** It's a number that shows how many parts we have out of a whole.

**Teacher:** Excellent! Can you give me an example?

**Student 2:** Like, if we have a pizza cut into four slices, and I eat one slice, that's one-fourth.

**Teacher:** Perfect! Now, let's look at some examples on the board.

**Translated Dialogue (Luganda):**

**Omusomesa:** Mwasuze mutya, abaana. Olwaleero, tugenda kutandika okuyiga ku byakyenkanyi. Waliwo ayinza okumbuulira ekyakyenkanyi kye ki?

**Omuyizi 1:** Eeeh, kiringa ekitundu ku kintu?

**Omusomesa:** Ekyo kirungi okutandika nakyo. Osobola okunnyonnyola mu bujjuvu?

**Omuyizi 2:** Muwendo ogulaga ebitundu bye tulina okuva mu bintu byonna.

**Omusomesa:** Kirungi nnyo! Osobola okuwa ekyokulabirako?

**Omuyizi 2:** Ng’ekyokulabirako, bwe tuba n’omugaati ogusaliddwa mu bitundu bina, ne ndya ekimu, ekyo kiba kimu kya kuna.

**Omusomesa:** Kituufu! Kati, ka tulabe ebyokulabirako ebiri ku lubaawo.

question: Omusomesa mu mwaka ogw’okubiri ogw’ekisulo ali n’abayizi be ku kunnyonnyola olulimi olw’akabonero. Okutuukiriza okuyiga kuno, asoma omuuliriro guno wamu n’abayizi be: OKUWANDIIKA ng’omuntu asuuliddwa ku kizinga ng’omugwira ng’omunnamawanga ng’omuntu atalina ggwanga Okweewala amaanyi g’ensimbi okuva mu bwetyo okuva mu butiitiizi Okusingawo empewo ennungi okusinga ebifo ebizingiddwa akatyabaga okusinga obukuumi okutambula okusinga obutebenkevu Ebitontome si kifo kiggumivu Ebitontome luguudo Ekigere mu musenyu omukalu ekkubo lyagobererwa nga kimanyiddwa nti teritwala wonna. (Jaime Pinos). Mu biragiro bino eby’omusomesa ebiruwa ebikulembera abayizi mu mulimu gw’okusoma okutegeera gwe balina okukola?
answer_a: Nkubiriza nti banoonyereze ku mbeera ezaaliwo ng’ekyeweruzo kiwandiikibwa n’emitwe gy’ebyogerwako egiri mu biwandiiko by’omuwandiisi, oluvannyuma balambike enkolagana wakati w’ebyo n’ekyeweruzo ekyolekeddwa.
answer_b: Mbagamba okusooka okusimba olukoloboze wansi w'ennimi ez'obuwangwa eziri mu mutexti oluvannyuma balondooloole ennimi ezo ze zikwatagana nazo era n'olwekyo, engeri entuufu ey'okuzisoma.
answer_c: Ndi mu kubawa amagezi okunoonya ebigambo byonna bye batategeera okuva mu kitontome, gamba nga omutembeyi, omusuulwa, n’oyo atalina ggwanga, era bakakase engeri gye bikwatagana.
answer_d: Ndi mu kubawa amagezi okusooka okutunula mu mutwe gw'ekigambo okusobola okutegeera ekitabo kye kirimu, oluvannyuma batandike okukolagana wakati w'ebigambo ebikulu ebikoonagana ku mutwe gw'ekigambo, amakulu g'ebigambo ebyo bwe gategeeza, n'enneewulira bye bireeta.

question: Omusomesa, mu mwaka ogusooka, akolera wamu n'abayizi be ku mutendera gw'okunnyonnyola ebiri mu by'osoma. Okukola kino, akozesa enkola y'okubuuza ebibuuzo ku lw'olugero olumpi olukozeseddwa, ng'abuuza ebibuuzo ebikwata ku mutendera gw'okunnyonnyola ebiri mu by'osoma: Twagalanga nnyo okuzannya mu luggya olw'ettaka. Twagobanga enkoko. Laucha yali "azikakasa". Yazikyangaalira n'aziteeka wansi. Ng'akozesa akati akato, yakubanga ekikomera kyazo. Buli kimu kyali kya kyama. Olusozi oluli ewala. Eddoboozi ly'empewo. Era maama wange ng'ali mu ddirisa yatulabiriranga nga tukula. Ku Sande emu, embwa embi yatuggyako taata waffe. Maama wange yafiira mu bulamu. "Agendewo, muwala wange," omuwala omuto bwe yagamba, "labirira maama wo." Nakula mangu nga ndi wa myaka kkumi na ebiri. Okutuusa lwe nnatuuka e Santiago, saamanya nti tuli baavu. (Obuto, Pablo Ortiz Tirado. Santiago mu bigambo Kikumi). Mu bibuuzo bino wammanga, kibuuzo ki ekikwata ku mutendera gw'okunnyonnyola ebiri mu lukungo?
answer_a: Lwaki omuzannyi omukulu agamba nti akuze mangu mu bwangu?
answer_b: Bintu ki ebiri mu lubalo ebikwataganya omuzannyi omukulu n’obuto bwe?
answer_c: Wandiwulidde ng’oli mwavu, okufaanana ng’omutontomi, bwe waba ng’ova mu kyalo okudda mu kibuga? Lwaki?
answer_d: Laucha yakozesa ngeri ki okukwekwetekereza enkoko?

question: Omusomesa mu mwaka ogwokusatu ogw’ekisulo, akolera wamu n’abayizi be ku kiruubirirwa kino: "Okutegeera engeri z’okuwandiika emboozi." Okukola kino, annyonnyola empisa za buli ngeri, oluvannyuma aleeta ebyokulabirako era awa abayizi omukutu okusobola okutegeera engeri zino mu bitundu eby’enjawulo. Ekimu ku bitundu mu ngeri etali butereevu era nga ya lukusa kiri nga bwe kiri wammanga: "Charles yeewuunyizza obweru bw’enjala ze. Zaali njeru, nga ziwawaala ku ntikko, nga zikoleddwa bulungi okusinga amannyo g’endovu ag’e Dieppe, era nga ziringa almondi. Naye omukono gwali si mulungi, oboolyawo nga si mweru kumala, era nga gufaanana embalaasi mu nnyingo; era gwali muwanvu nnyo era nga tegwaliimu bukugu bw’emigongo ku nkula. Ekyali kirungi amaaso; newankubadde nga gaali ga kyenvu, gaalabika nga maddu olw’emyoyo gy’oku maaso, era ng’atunuulira mu butuufu n’obuvumu obw’ekimoomo." (Madame Bovary, Gustave Flaubert). Omu ku bayizi azzeemu nti ekitundu kirimu engeri etali butereevu kubanga waliwo omwogezi ow’okusatu. Nga tutunuulidde okuddamu kuno, bya bya muwendo ki ebikwata ku ngeri z’okuwandiika emboozi omusomesa by’alina okwogerako abayizi basobole okutegeera engeri etali butereevu era nga ya lukusa?
answer_a: Okutegeera engeri omutontomi gy’atunuuliramu ebiri mu lugero
answer_b: Okutegeera ebika by’abanoonyereza mu mboozi
answer_c: Enjawulo wakati w'eddoboozi ly'omunnyonnyozi n'ery'abantu abakola ebikolwa mu lugero
answer_d: Okumanya omuntu annyonnyola byafaayo gy’ayimiridde okutunulira ebyo by’annyonnyola.

question: Omusomesa mu kibiina eky’okuna mu siniya agenda kukebera ekigendererwa kino: “Okutegeera empisa z’ekigambo ekimpi era ekirimu amagezi, mu mbeera y’okunnyonnyola ebitontome eby’ekyasa ekya 20”. Ku biragiro bino wammanga, kiruwa ekiraga ekigendererwa ekyo eky’okukebera?
answer_a: Balondoola omulamwa ogw’okubuulirira ogusangika mu bigambo ebitonotono (epigram).
answer_b: Ze nnyonnyola amakulu g'omuntu ow'ekinnabisoogno ku ngeri amakulu agazimbye ekigambo ekimpi gye gasinziira.
answer_c: Banannyonnyola amakulu ag'obwenje mu lugero olufaananyi ku mazima ge lwagaliza okutuusa.
answer_d: Bamutegeera omuwandiiko ogw'oku kiwandiiko okuba ogw'okutendereza olw'okuba guteekeddwa waggulu w'ekintu ekyawandiikiddwa.

question: Omusomesa, mu kibiina kya S.3, agenda kukebera, ng’ayitira mu kigezo ekiwandiike, ekigendererwa kino: "Okutegeera omulimu abantu ab’enjawulo gwe bakola mu buzibu obuli mu lugero, nga basinziira ku kusoma olugero." Ku biragiro bino wammanga, kiruwa ekiraga nti okuyiga okwo kwe kubaddewo?
answer_a: Balaga engeri enkolagana z’abantu abalina obukulu mu lugero gye ziri n’engeri gye zikosa emboozi.
answer_b: Bakebera engeri buli muntu omu ku abo abazannyi mu lugero gy’eyakolamu ebintu n’engeri ebyo gye byaleeta enkomerero y’olugero.
answer_c: Banoonya engeri abantu abali mu lugero gye balina endowooza n’enneeyisa yaabwe, era endowooza ezo ze zikola ku ngeri olugero gye lukulakulanaamu.
answer_d: Bagabanya buli muntu omuwandiike mu kitabo okusinziira ku bukulu bwe mu mboozi, nga balaga engeri gye bakifuulira okukulaakulanya ebyo ebiri mu mboozi.

question: Omusomesa mu mwaka ogusooka ogw’ekisulo abuuza abayizi be okukola ekiwandiiko ku mutwe gwe baagala. Mu mutendera gw’okulambula, omusomesa alungisa ekiwandiiko kino okuva ku omu ku bayizi: Kikulu okulabirira obutonde, naddala kati nga tuli mu kiseera ekizibu ennyo omulamwa ogusinga obubi, okusinziira ku bannasayansi, kwe kuba nti tuli mu kiseera obutonde bwe butakyasobola kuddawo, ng’ensi tekyalina budde bumala kuzza buggya bintu bye twamalawo. Tekimala kuzikiza taala okumala essaawa emu oba okulekeraawo okusuula pulasitika mu mazzi, kubanga kimanyiddwa nti kampuni ennene ze zirina omuwendo gw’obucaafu ogusingawo era ogwa bulijjo. Ennyingo esembayo eya lipooti y’ekibiina ky’amawanga amagatte, eyakubibwa mu August w’omwaka guno, egamba era ekakasa kino: awatali nkyukakyuka nnene, enkyukakyuka entono tezigenda kumala. N’olwekyo, kikulu okulabirira obutonde ku mutendera omunene, okuva ku kinene okutuuka ku kitono. Leero kyetaagisa mangu. Kintu ki ku nkola z’ennima kyetaagisa omusomesa okukozesa n’omuyizi eyakola ekiwandiiko kino?
answer_a: Okuteeka obubonero obw'enjawulo ku nnukuta
answer_b: Okuwandiika ebigambo ebifaanagana mu mateeka kyokka nga byawukana amakulu
answer_c: Okuwandiika ebigambo ebifaanagana
answer_d: Enkola enkulu ez'okussa akazimbulukusa

question: Ku mirundi gy'okuyiga egiddirira, gumu ku gyo ogikulaakulanya okumanya amakulu g'ebigambo (semantic awareness) era lwaki?
answer_a: Okutondekawo sentensi n'olukalala lw'ebiseera kubanga bikiriza okutegeka ebigambo.
answer_b: Okukola okwawula n'okufaananya okw'omumwa kubanga bikusobozesa okuwa amakulu eri ebigambo
answer_c: Okukola dduyiro y’okuwaana n’okwawula ebigambo mu nsalango kubanga bikusobozesa okutegeera eddoboozi ly’ebigambo.
answer_d: Okukozesa emizannyo gy'ebiseera by'ebikolwa n'okunnyonnyola empisa z'abantu kubanga bikusobozesa okutegeka ebigambo.

question: Ku biragiro bino wammanga, kiki ekireetera omuyizi okukulaakulanya okumanya engeri y’okukozesaamu olulimi mu mbeera ez’enjawulo?
answer_a: Zuula obutali butuufu mu bigambo ebiri mu ngero ennyimpi.
answer_b: Kola engero ez'ebigambo ng'okozesa kaadi ez'ebifaananyi by'ebigambo.
answer_c: Ggwaamu ebyo ebiri mu bigambo eby'ebbugumu eby'ennono ez'enjawulo.
answer_d: Tegeka sentensi ennyangu mu ngeri endala ku eyo eteereddwaawo.
